Delivery was expected by June 1, 2020. It was delivered May 24, 2020. Such a pleasant surprise. From the other reviewers, I was prepared for some missing volume but even if I received 96/128 oz. for less than $20, I would be thrilled. No problems at all, I received all 128 oz. I even had a foil seal under the plastic cap. It smells a little alcohol-y, but some sanitizers always did. I was using 91% alcohol anyway. It seems a little watery, but I've been using liquid (not gel) sanitizer and alcohol in spray bottles. Is it real Germ-X? I don't care, I have been buying sanitizer from distilleries for $40/gallon. It was extra for gel. People were selling expired sanitizer, so there's that. Things that may be a deterrent for some didn't matter to me. Fast shipping, No leaks. Good price. Winner, winner, chicken dinner.

I guess Germ-X just isn’t what it used to be. It was really runny- not the gel Sanitizer I remember using pre-Covid.. and it has a really strong scent. Definitely not “unscented”! I wish it was just an alcohol scent to it! It smells rotten and lingers on my hands. The only good thing I can say about it is that while it was sliding through my hands like water since it’s more like a turning a 2 liter of coke up than a gel hand sanitizer to get a glob out into your palm!!!- it did sting a paper cut on the underside of my hand! So it should do the job if you can manage to get it on every side of your hands and leave it that for a few seconds to do its thing! Really disappointed! I know like everyone else that ordered this, I was SO disappointed that this wasn’t the real thing! After months of hunting for the name brand we are accustomed to and it being sold out and hoarded by selfish people- I was excited to get a few bottles to have to give to my kids’ teachers in August, family members, friends, and bus drivers! People who would need something that would STICK! Not this stuff that slips right though your fingers and smells like *censored because you wouldn’t post this review if I told you how it really smelled!!!* Sick of 2020 being the year of lies and being taken advantage of at every single turn! Shame on your amazon and YOU TOO GERM-X! I’d return it but all the other hand sanitizer is just as awful and at this point, I have to make do with something awful. Next time, I’ll buy the one that starts with a P and PRAY that company is honest on Amazon!

I was thankful that I was able to find this product for my father, sister, daughter and myself. The delivery was perfect, so that was great. However, all except for two bottles were missing at least 1 inch of sanitizer. It appears as if someone took some from each bottle. There was no protective foil lining the bottle opening, so this was easy to do.
Product arrived in good shape but the smell is horrible.
Most of the bottle tops were lose and leaking. I paid a lot for these because my son needed them for school. He will not be able to use them as they will leak all over his back pack and gym bag.

This is  NOT an authentic product. My package arrived ysterday (05/28/2020) and the bottles were NOT equally full. Two of them were not level the same as the other two. The consistency was NOT gel as the original GermX . The smell was NOT the same, even the tops/caps were a different color than the original GermX . GermX has a unique fragrance and this was NOT it. I didn't dare to put it on my hands. DO NOT BUY! By the way, IT IS NOT REFUNDABLE. Save your hard earn money $$$
Bottles were not filled all the way. They weren’t even sealed either. Also, it is extremely watery. Doesn’t seem to be the real brand of Germ-X.

I have purchased multiple Germ-X with amazon since the pandemic started. And I always check it to see the quality. Never have I been disappointed. This is the only brand that I love the formula, how it feels and the smell. We all know that Germ-X scent. UNTIL now. I received the 32oz bottle July 5th and immediately I knew something was wrong, it flows like water!!! Not thick at all. And the smell.. cheap tequila!! NOT GERM-X formula at all!! I’m so disappointed on the quality. When you put it on, it doesn’t feel like gel, feels like water!! If I had ordered hand sanitizer from another brand and this is what I got, I wouldn’t care because i know it’s gonna be different. But this feels extremely cheap and ripped off. I bought the brand Germ-X for a reason. I know what I want, so I’m paying for that brand.

I bought two orders of these 32oz 4pk GermX. The first time I bought it, the product was perfect. It smelled just like the small bottle of GermX I bought at Target. So weeks later I decided to order another set to give out to family, but these bottles did not smell good at all. It smelled like cheap vodka gone bad! As far as the consistency of the product, it is very watery and not gel like. I actually found the same product at Target and the consistency was the same like these bottles from Amazon, very watery. I wish I could return the second set I bought because the smell is truly horrible, and I don’t think anyone would want that smell on their hands. It seems like the manufacturer of this product is cutting corners in order to mass produce. They are reducing the amount of gel that is normally put in the product, and they’re not adding any fragrance, which leads people to believe they’re getting fake GermX. I honestly won’t be buying this product/brand ever again and hopefully Purell becomes available soon.

Bargain given with these sanitizers go for nowadays!  Doesn’t leave your hands sticky like others do Note that this only contain 62% alcohol, and the recommendation is that it should have at least 70%

I'm a little concerned if this is actual hand sanitizer by Germ X in the bottles. None of the bottles were sealed. Some had more liquid than others. And one was spilling in the box? I'm pretty sure there should have been a seal on top of the bottles under the cap and I don't feel so safe using it.

Purchased the 12 pack of 10 Oz bottles. They were packed well. That is why I gave it one star. I noticed that none of the bottles had a foil seal, not really sure if any of the ones I purchase at the store have them but it definitely caught my attention. One bottle was only half full and the cap was barely on the bottle. I used a tiny amount to try it out and oh my goodness if I had an appetite let's say I wouldn't have had one after smelling the sanitizer. It smells like a mix of baby vomit, baby poop, a hint of a multipurpose flowery scented cleaning solution, a retirement home or cheap motel, and air freshener sprayed into the air after someone has taken a massive dump and tried to mask the scent. I added 91% isopropyl alcohol to the bottle that was half filled and it barely reduced the scent of the very detailed mixture of scents I described. I hate having to return items especially by shipping soooooo I guess I'll be transferring them into different bottles where I can add more isopropyl alcohol. Do yourself a favor, just go to your local pharmacy or department store and purchase what you know works and doesn't wreak so bad

Im very skeptical these days - with Covid and the recent "fake and dangerous" hand sanitizer scare. Now, I don't know that there is anything wrong with this but it certainly has me concerned fr a few reasons: 1) the box was damaged and had no safety seals - just tape 2) the bottles are all filled to different levels - also no safety seals and screw tops were loose 3) one bottle was leaking from loose top - It just seems obvious that these were not filled in a factory setting and that they were filled an assembled by hand - This may not indicate a problem but it does raise an eyebrow - Please do better thx

It seems as the real deal so no complaints about that.. The seal was missing in each bottle which do have me concern.. I have always used germ-x since I had have grandkids hopefully it's just a safe as the germ-x I have purchased from store

Short of waiting a bit for delivery (19 days), everything about this purchase was perfect. Product is authentic, delivered undamaged, bottles are full with no leakage, and last but not least,.........the price for the quantity is great. This will keep me for a good length of time, and I can even give away a bottle or two to friends that need it.

The price that I paid on Amazon for four 32 ounce bottles of hand sanitizer from a well-known manufacturer is pretty terrific. It sells out fast and I had to check back often to get an order placed. The version that I received is 62% ethyl alcohol, so it meets CDC requirements for ethyl alcohol based hand sanitizer. The good news is it doesn't smell awful - it's almost kind of pleasant with just a very mild alcohol aroma. I've purchased other hand sanitizers made with ethyl alcohol/ethanol and they've smelled strongly like cheap tequila, so it's a relief that this product has a non-offensive scent. While technically a gel, it's somewhat thin and runny. The consistency is okay once you know what to expect - just rub it in quickly so none drips off. After it dries, there's no stickiness and perhaps there's a plus for not being a thicker gel. The expiration date is just under 2 years from now, so no worries about aging out before using it all up. Delivery was much sooner than the original estimated date, like a couple weeks sooner. The bad news is my shipment leaked, like many other reviewers have noted. One of the four bottles had a faulty flip top - had a hole in it directly over the little pour spout. The bottle lost about 15% of its contents. I opened the box within a couple hours after delivery, so maybe I'm lucky that I got to it before more leaked out. The other three bottles were fine. If you order, just make sure to check for any leakage promptly upon delivery.

This was not real GermX... I specifically bought this product because the GermX scent is ore pleasant than other sanitizers... every single bottle I received smelled like a cheap tequila. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED. Will not order again.

I rarely leave reviews. But this one needs to be done. I purchased this over a month ago and figured and received it yesterday. I expected the delay and that was fine. Two bottles had leaked all over the box. The other two had lids that were barely on. I can deal with that. It happens. But the smell is ATROCIOUS! My kids refuse to have it on their hands. It made one of them gag. I can't place the smell but it's not alcohol and definitely does not smell like other bottles I have around the house. There is also a very sticky feel to the gel. I had to wash my hands after using it because the stickiness would not go away. Now I'm stuck with a 4 pack that I was going to use to fill up the kid's small bottles they keep at school. I have to donate a product such as this. Don't want anyone else using it!

So it was authentic germX, hand sanitizer gel, but like other reviewers said, it leaked everywhere in the box!! None of the caps were screwed on tightly to the bottles. I get that the hand sanitizer factory is probably working double speed right now, but just...screw the lids on!

Even after reading all the negative reviews, I went against my better judgement and purchased this product.  Bad move!  One bottle was half empty, one bottle was crushed and all of them are water down.  Save your money!

I bought the Germ-x  because I am familiar with the brand. It came full. Some complained it did not have a seal but when I bought these bottles at Walmart and Dollar Tree it did not come with a seal either. Also, if you have any papercuts and use this hand sanitizer you will definitely know it has alcohol. Delivery time was two weeks, which was reasonable for this current time.

GermX is typically my favorite and is the only hand sanitizer that I will buy.  I like that it typically has light unnoticeable scent.  I found these on sale so I decided to buy them.  I got them today and the scent is horrible and smells like cheap restaurant hand soap and the fragrance will remain on your hands for awhile after using.  I tried to return them but unfortunately you are not able to return them.  If you are sensitive too smell I would recommend avoiding these and just buying GermX from the store.

Very sorry to see a formerly great product, turned into a weak, watery substance! You will pour twice (or more) of what you need, as it runs out like a river. No idea why the formula was changed. It may have the same name and logo, but the product is NOT the same.

I noticed none of the bottles had a plastic seal and they were all missing sanitizer.  You'll get 4x 32 fl oz bottles with a lot missing.  They were placed in a box (none seemed to be spilled inside), but 3 out of 4 bottles were squeezed and dented.  Either this was accidental or an attempt to make it look like the bottles were more full than they were. Whether there's some conspiracy to screw me out of product or not, bottom line, I was screwed out of product.  I filled 3 of the bottles up with one of the others to make it easier to see how much you should have VS how much you're getting ripped off.  Up to you whether they're worth buying or not, but know they're not packaged with plastic seals and they'll be missing product, whether they spill in the box or not.

I know it is a big brand so people all knew and trust it for but the bottles arrived cap opened or not sealed all the way. After shipping the box move left to right all the time, the inside gel comes out everywhere inside the deliver box making a big mess almost every time because the bottle caps were all loose or off the bottles. This is an easy fix that the vendor just needs to make sure the cap is sealed and tight all the way. Hope the vendor will take care of it in the future.

Not sure why everyone is yelling FAKE!!! I do not think Amazon would take any risk of selling a fake product, i personally dont think its worth it... Yes we are in a pandemic and these are high demand items so the company may cut back on something that they may feel is safe to do in order to make sure its enough to go around rather than not enough at all... I purchased Clorox Germicide from Home Depot and received different labels but i check it and its the same product... A bunch of over grown folks pouting like we are all perfect or you too good for the product... Grow up... Its not fake, maybe watery but repeat not fake

Some reviews claim that is is not real Germ x but I disagree. Compared bottle to one I purchased few weeks ago from local store and it is the same scent, ingredients and constancy. The formula is slightly different then an old bottle from before covid. If you smell straight from the big bottle it doesn't smell the greatest however when it's on my hand I dont notice an overwhelming smell. Doesn't leave hands sticky like.some other brands which I love. Great price to refill bottle at home and to send to school with kids.

When everywhere was out of stock on hand sanitizer, I saw this fantastic deal on a Facebook group and jumped on it. Im so glad I did, since my work reopened in early May and we could not source any hand sanitizer from the usual corporate options. This supply refilled our bottles at work stations and more. I lucked out and was able to purchase a second time, so we had some future refills. This IS the genuine GermX product, despite what some other reviews state, and has helped us tremendously at our doctor's office. The shipping was super fast; though I was thinking it was going to be 3 weeks, it wound up being only a week.

I've been using this product for years.  The product was put in a box and then placed in a 2nd box for protection. When I received the product I could smell the Germ X before I opened the box. The second box was intact, but the first box that the product was in, had 2 of the bottles damaged at the top which allowed some of the Germ X to escape and spill into the box. Gladly I had just finished a large bottle of sanitizer and was able to pour what was left of the 2 damaged bottles in another bottle.  I was only offered to return the Germ X not to replace it.  Too missy to return.

Upon receiving my shipment I noticed these bottles seemed more watery than usual. Purchased a smaller bottle from target to compare. Same thing. It is legit and original Germ X. The reason why the consistency and thickness isn’t the same is because there is a severe shortage of ingredients used to manufacture this product. Seeing as most of the ingredients for Clorox wipes, hand sanitizers, Lysol sprays and all the other high demand items are from overseas quality of product isn’t the same. Shipping was good but one bottle did leak a little bit not very much.
Bottles were not sealed. Bought this for a business. Cannot give to guests without knowing what’s actually really in it.

You can definitely tell that they're trying to stretch the product as far as it can go so its a little watery but hey, I'll take 62% alcohol content over nothing and when I've been seeing 8 oz go for 7.99 in stores, 4 of these for $17 is an absolute steal. All of my bottles came sealed and in great condition.

product is shipped 4 bottles per case / box with a clearly marked arrow up. Case / box is then placed in an oversized cardboard box with some few packing pillows to fill remaining space and NO INDICATION of which end needs to be up. Summary of the four bottles I received follows : 1 full bottle (cap secure) ... 1 bottle 15/16 full (cap no longer clicked fully closed) ... 1 bottle 7/8 full (cap no longer clicked fully closed) & 1 bottle approx 2/3 full (cap completely flipped fully open and ready to dispense). The remaining 10 to 12 ounces of the product coated the interior of the inner box and the outer surfaces of the bottles with the jelly like goo beginning to dissolve the adhesive holding the bottle labels in place. On a positive note the inner cardboard box with it's liberal coating of sanitizer is now 100% COVID protected .. Me ? not so much now.

This is the first time I've ever purchased and used Germ X as I've only used other brands at work in the past.  I am happy that I can buy 1 dozen and share with my colleagues.  I really love the light scent of this product and it doesn't leave as much residue on my hands making me want to wash my hands after just 1 use.

Received sanitizer earlier than expected during the time when sanitizer deliveries are long due to consumer interest.  Sanitizer is much more watery than others, which is not a problem and it is not sticky like others.  Definitely smell the alcohol in the product, but has not other smell.  Product does meet my family needs.  Packing is horrible as many others have commented on for this product type-4 large bottles in one box.  All for caps were loose in the box and product seeped out from all four bottles.  About one inch from each bottle.  Other vendors who I received similar products put tape around caps to ensure no opening during transit.  Beware, you may be one of the unlucky purchasers, like many whose product will be inside the contents of the box.  Product is double mixed boxed, however this does not help leakage.
These are the real deal!  They arrived nicely packed, there was only 1 in the box that was almost empty maybe an oversight, other than that I am very happy!

I mean, hey, its Germ-X hand sanitizer in big bottles. It can be used to refill smaller pump bottles or refill pocket size bottles. Seems less expensive to buy these big bottle to refill your smaller bottles. I guess you could use these big bottles on a larger scale if you really big hands. Smells like, um, Germ-X. So, no surprise there. It is a clear gel type liquid, which would be expected if you have ever used Germ-X. As the label says, it is for hands, so don't do stupid stuff and use it all over your body. I have a feeling that may not end well. If you get it in your eyes it is irritating, so use it only as directed by the manufacturer. READ THE LABEL. And hey, go to their website and read up on it if you are the type of person to use things in ways they are not intended.

Not sure if I got faked one or not. The bottles are not sealed. After two weeks, the liquid level became different in different bottles. I unscrewd the cap, found there are no that additional layer of seal, that you need to break before first time use. It is very watery. Not like the product picture, which has a lot of bubbles in it, looks like jelly and thick and sticky. Shaking the bottle feels like shaking a bottle of wine.

I hardly ever write a review but I'm inclined to think these are fake. When comparing consistency, smell, ingredients and the fine print, I saw some discrepancies between store bought germ-x versus the amazon purchased ones. Store bought germ x has a very nice pleasant smell. Amazon's has a pungent alcohol smell and not at all pleasant. Store bought say 63% alcohol versus Amazon's 62%. Shouldn't the same brand be consistent all around? Even the typing was a bit off, such as the order of the inactive ingredients and using the symbol '&' in Amazon's product versus AND in the store bought. I'm more than certain these are counterfeit but not worth the trouble to return. As far as the 5-star reviews...I don't know..seems very suspect to me. But if it's safe hand sanitizer, I guess it's worth the cost, but it's definitely not the real deal. Buyer beware!

Arrived in good shape, real deal with  expiration out 2 yrs. Quality control on filling of bottles could use some work. Some are completely full, others almost full. Not a big problem, and price very good!
They came packaged well and I had no leaking issues. I prefer Germ X over Purell because it smells better and doesn't feel as watery.
I’ve used germX for years. This is not at all the same, and literally smells like bile. Thankfully getting a refund. Don’t buy.

This is fake Germ X. First, one bottle was short filled- a quality control that wouldn't have gotten by an authentic production facility.  Second, I opened the cap and the liquid inside smelled like a rancid sewer.  Either Germ X sold a bad batch or someone substituted the good stuff with fake stuff at the Amazon distribution center. I have a bottle of real Germ X that smells right and feels right to compare it to.

I've used Purell for years and now it is either hard to find or the price is jacked up. Germ-X to me seems like the same quality and I used it to refill Purell pump bottlesdoes it .  It works just the same and more importantly is does not have any nasty odors. Some industrial sanitizers like they have in offices or public spaces have a nasty odor that smell like a full garbage truck on a hot summer day.

Best value for product and arrived in time. However the box that packed the 4 Germ-X containers was soaking wet. Some of the bottles in the box packaged by Germ-x (NOT the Amazon packaging) had very loose caps that I had to tighten after I took them out. Unfortunately some of the containers had already leaked all over the inner box and some of the product therefore missing. This was not an Amazon packaging issue.

In picture advertised you see white or clear tops. When I received my order clearly on the box it stated germ x white top...but my tops were blue. If my sanitizer was not runny like water or bottles not completely full I wouldn't care if tops were polka dot..but with tops being a different color and product really runny I question the authenticity of this germ x

As we all know, hand sanitizer is still hard to come by and a pricey proposition these days. So, when I saw this offer at a reasonable price, I  jumped at it. I'll use it but I was disappointed.  The alcohol smell is simply overwhelming and it is pure liquid with a watery consistency, not remotely gel like. It just runs off your hands if you aren't very careful when you pour it out of the bottle. If the smell is any indication, it does indeed have the stated alchohol content in it and should kill germs effectively.  Since that's the ultimate point,  I suppose it'll get the job done but I'm not thrilled.  I can't wait until I can get my hands on some Germ-X  Gel Sanitizer with Aloe but who knows how long it will be until that's available again.

Amazon denied my previous blurb for being to explicit and vivid because i was being too honest and transparent about my real feelings, so I'll keep it brief and short. Don't buy this , if you even go to Germ-x's site, they don't even show this bottle type or the scent.  It seems either this was counterfit or something went bad in terms of the sanitizer or the scent. I just wasted $40 and not the manufacturer or Amazon doesn't care.  It seems I'll need to start taking up to the BBB board on both Amazon and Germ-x and Vijon about this issue.  This product really induced a nauseous feeling ,and it lingers. DO NOT BUY i REPEAT DO NOT BUY - BUY THE OTHER SIZES - at least they are NOT cherry (bought 4x32oz and they were OK)

Great value for the price, but when I received the box of 4 bottles, one had been partially crushed before it had even been put in the box....outside box was fine. Top and parts of bottom of box were wet where it had leaked everywhere.  Also, this sanitizer is much more "runny" and not as thick as the sanitizer used to be. I'm guessing because of the backlog and maybe trying to save costs, I don't know. Price was great and it took about 2 weeks to get, but that was expected.
It came quick and 4 big bottles.  I didn’t like the fact some of the bottles was not full. that was disappointing ... it shipped fast.

First thing I noticed when I opened the box was one of them was leaking. The top wasn't tight on the bottle. Then I pulled all of them out of the bx and noticed that only one of the three was full. The other three definitely were not full, as you can see from the picture. Then, I noticed that these seemed kind of watery and I glanced at another review that pointed out the main inactive ingredient was water. I confirmed tat on mine. The main INACTIVE ingredient is water. I've never seen GermX be this watery before. I've always seen if have a gel-type of consistency, not watery. I would not but these again. I feel I got ripped off, just by the fact that they weren't full.

Overall, you know what you're getting from GermX versus a random start up. The price was also fair given the shortage and demand these days. The only complaint that I had, and echoed by others in the reviews, is that apparently some slight amount leaked out in transit, so packaging could be better. We're talking way under 10% so it's not a dealbreaker and worth sending back, but just a slight annoyance. Would still recommend at a reasonable price.

I typically do not write reviews but with this one I felt like I needed to. This product is not Germ X. I have several Germ X bottle I bought from the grocery store to compare the two. Not only are the labels different, but the product smells differently. While real Germ X has a very clean smell, the other product smells like rotten liquor.  As much as I wanted this sanitizer to be real, it isn't. I am a teacher and I was trying to stock up for when we return to school in the fall.  I will be sending this fake product back.

I had been using cheaper options for hand sanitizer for a while, but the strong alcoholic scent in cheaper brands pushed me to resort back to Germ-X. Although this price is slightly higher than what I would normally pay for, I think the non-scented hand sanitizer and the fact it is from a reputable brand was worth the cost for me. This has been my main sanitizer so far. No news is good news to me! I purchased two separate orders (one to me, and one to my relatives), and luckily there were no spillage issues I read in other reviews, though I wish there were a seal right underneath the cap of each bottle.

I don't know what happened to Germ-X but this is not the same product I ordered 2 months ago. In addition to also being watered down, this batch has a HORRIBLE SMELL. I mean it's like nothing I've ever smelt before. Can HAND SANITIZER go bad? Cause this batch certainly did. Although I'm grateful to have it, the odor is so off putting I think I'd rather donate it than use it myself. In addition it makes me wonder if this is some other hand sanitizer (likely one that we were warned to not buy due to the addition of menthol) and that's why it smells so GOD DAMN HORRIBLE. One of the bottles I bought 2 months ago on the left, the FAKE germ-x on the right.

good product of course, but might not make it to you.  4 big bottle in a cardboard box that is a little to big for it, inside of a really big box.  The snap caps on the bottles barely seal and aren't taped, so they bounce around within the 2 boxes and open up and spill.  All 4 bottle had some missing, one was half empty, and the cardboard was soaked through with Germ X.

The bottles arrived in perfect, damage free condition.  The key to getting your hands on hand sanitizer, wipes, toilet paper, or anything that Covid-19 has depleted, is to search ALL DAY LONG!  Search your item every chance you get. Have the address where you want it shipped ready to go, and when you spot your item, BUY immediately. Don't think about it, because by the time you go to buy, it will be gone.

I'm a little worried about the authenticity of this product.  It does look exactly l;ike the pictures but there is no safety seals on any of the bottles, different amounts in every bottle and the caps were not on tightly so half of one bottle spilled out inside the box during shipping.  That said, it smells like alcohol and does moisturize.........

I received the order today and immediately noticed how sketchy the packaging and products were. The box inside the amazon box was wide open, not at all sealed. Each bottle is watery, the labels are crooked and bubbly. I happened to buy Germ-X today at Target, so I have an authentic bottle to compare it to. DO NOT BUY! See pictures for the clear difference. The real Germ-X has many more bubbles as shown in the pic. The fake bottle in comparison hardly has any. Don’t be duped by the low price.

Received today. Like others, all 4 bottles came unsealed. You just open the cap and there it is, no seal. Like many others, Each bottle was missing about 2 inches of sanitizer. It smells like hand sanitizer. My first thought is that it is not germ x. That another cheaper brand of sanitizer was poured into the bottles. With so many poor reviews, i wish I had not bought. Buy elsewhere.
Half of the product leaked in the box!

We were very happy to finally be able to order some hand sanitizer at a reasonable price - but this was not what we were expecting.  We already had a couple of small bottles of Germ-X around the house,  and it was a gel like any other hand sanitizer you would get in a small bottle or a pump.  However, these are definitely not gel.  We are still glad to have "something" (as opposed to nothing), but if you are looking for a gel, keep looking.  These bottles are almost the consistency of water.

These are the big 32 ounce size bottles. Wow, what a deal! But FYI this isn’t the thicker gel stuff. It has a consistency that is thicker than water, but more runny than a gel. It is 62% ethyl alcohol. I may use this to disinfect some surfaces too (but do not use this on anything wood because it will damage the finish of wood furniture.

This is NOT THE SAME as regular germx you buy at the grocery store. Has a foul smell when rubbing on hands, and once dry leaves a strong undesirable smell like cheap bathroom soap or an old mamaw scent according to my fiancé. I will be throwing this out or donating it since I can not return it. I bought these to fill mini hand sanitizer bottles for my upcoming wedding and am very disappointed.

Although others are reporting partially empty bottles, all four of mine were full.  Scent is the same as pre-covid product but it is a bit more watery.  It takes a bit longer to dry and seems to be a tad sticky for a few seconds, but other than that it's no different than before.  Pleased with this product and will purchase again when this batch runs out.

I am very disappointed. I ordered this thinking I was getting germx. This is like water and it smells like cheap hand sanitizer. I only buy germx so when I saw this I was elated with the deal. I wish I had read reviews. I know they are mixed but mine IS NOT legit germx. I have shown my purchase this to several different people and they agree. I don’t know if they are making so much of it they are cutting corners but I am disappointed with this product.

The very first thing I noticed was that it is not as thick as Germ-X I've purchased in the past. It's runny like some of the off-brands I've bought over the past 3 or 4 months. Maybe that's just the way it's being made these days, I don't know. However, my very first thoughts was that it had been "watered" down, although I know that actual water could not be used for that purpose in this product. I'm going to buy a small bottle the next time local stores has it to compare the thickness. If there is a difference I intend to come back here and update my review.
Me yego bien rapido muy buen pruducto

I really wanted the Purell brand of hand sanitizer with aloe but could not find it anywhere. I purchase the Germ X brand and so far we are satisfied with the product. This bundle, when I purchased it, was at an excellent purchase price. It's not as pleasant smelling as the  Purell brand with Aloe I usually purchase but it does do the job at killing the germs. At this time of everyone needing to be very protective and doing our part with not spreading germs, having a trusted brand like Germ X is a major plus.

Wish I had read reviews before I bought but I was just so excited to see hand sanitizer available that I just ordered. This is NOT real Germx. I have real Germx and this is not it. Plus, received it damaged, one bottle leaked all over box, not sealed on inside. Just sloppy and FAKE. And sadly, not returnable.

I PURCHASE 4 PACKS 32 OZ BOTTLES IN JUNE 2020.... FOR SENIORS CITIZENS...WHO DONT HAVE A COMPUTER..THEY WERE HAPPY..... NEED SPRAY LYSOL SPRAY CAN......THE SENIORS ARE TELLING THERE FRIENDS 90-100 YEARS OLD AND LIVE ALONE....I AM UNABLE TO GET THE MASK WITH RESPERATOR POSSIBLE SAVE THEIR LIVES...THIS IS FOR THE FRONT LINE WORKERS...7/6/20....

I opened the box and found only 3 of the 4 bottles it should have contained. It doesn't appear that the box was opened previously (no damage to cardboard, no second layer of tape, etc). Of the three bottles, there were two different "recipes" of hand sanitizer (labels indicate slightly different compositions). Two of the bottles contained sanitizer that is more watery, smells more strongly of alcohol, and were not completely full. The caps on those two was also significantly "looser" than the third bottle, so I am a bit concerned that the lower level of sanitizer may reflect that some of the alcohol has already evaporated out. The third bottle is closer to the product I was hoping to receive (less watery, less smell, and full bottle) with all bottles. Amazon support resolved this to my satisfaction, so overall I am reasonably satisfied with the product delivered under the circumstances, but not entirely happy. The lack of the fourth bottle is a longer term inconvenience and the inconsistency of receiving two different formulations in the same box feels odd as a consumer.

These appeared to be what I expected. However, the bottles aren't sealed tightly and the caps come loose in transit, so they arrived missing some of the product. Not sure why Amazon rejected my first review commenting on the arrival condition, since these were sold and shipped by Amazon. The loose lids are a product issue.

Purchased for $17. Went down to $16.19 a few days later. I absolutely hate that. Have seen this listing at $30 before though so not sure why that is. It is not a gel. It is not authentic, there were NO foil seals under the lids. It smells like refuse in a distillery. I bought a pineapple scent to add to it expecting that the scent wouldn’t be super pleasant. But I also didn’t expect it to be as viscous as water. If you can find something else in store do it. This was a regretted purchase.

I really anticipated this item to be good. Items came in two boxes inside of a bigger box.  The boxes had two boxes with the items in each box leaking. Unfortunate. The individual bottles should have been taped to prevent leaking.  I am not at all appreciative to receive products so badly needed this time period that were inadequate.  Would like company to make it right to send replacements.

I bought this because I'd had several bottles that smelled great and were easy on my hands. This is not the same product I'd had before. The smell made me gag when putting it on, and it lingered enough that I was forced to wash my hands to get rid of the smell. It was also much harsher than the previous batches. My hands felt like sand paper immediately. I'm disappointed.

I'm not sure if the contents in the GermX bottles sent to me are actually "Germ-X..." it smells different than the actual store brought germ x brand. It seems as if they mixed chemicals and poured them in GermX bottles. I have sent the bottles to a lab to be analyzed to make sure they dont contain the ingredients that the FDA has banned/ recalled with other sanitizers! BUYERS BEWARE

Order arrived undamaged, the box containing the bottles did have a skew tag noting it was Germ-X. The bottles were not sealed (but none of any sanitizers I have bought were sealed either). The caps were slightly loose but not enough to allow spilling of content. I compared the consistency and feel/smell to other hand sanitizers I had in the house and it was spot on in every aspect except the Germ -X was ever so slightly looser than others. I believe this is the real deal and a crazy bargain (so much so I see it is sold out with no restock date).

This stuff smells so much better than the stuff at the store that smells like straight vodka or paint stripper. It isnt harsh on my hands and I have super dry skin. For the price it was a steal. Only downside is a bottle came busted so I pretty much lost half a bottle and had a mess to clean up thats why i didnt give it a fantastic review. shouldnt have been shipped i think in a box with nothing even stuffing it so it was able to just crash around in the box. Either way the sanitizer is great.

I was lucky to purchase these twice. One purchase was about a month ago and took about a month to finally ship. The other purchase was just a week ago but also arrived at the same time. Fortunately, none of my bottles were leaking compared to the other reviews I've read. The bottles that I bought a month ago, came from VA and they had the white cap. The bottles that I bought last week were from IN and they had the other turquoise cap and also came sealed. Also, the background color on the sticker (where it says original hand sanitizer for the turquoise cap is a different shade of blue compared to the white cap (The white cap had a lighter blue sticker). All of these give me an impression that it's not the actual germ-x (not like I would know). I would still buy these as long as it's hand sanitizer and for the great value. Buy at your own risk. I also purchased a different germ-x bottle (aloe with pumps). The box they were in had the germ-x logo on it while these did not.

These bottles are great for refilling the smaller pump bottles.  We received some other brand of hand sanitizer at work during the pandemic, but I cant stand using it...its slimy when you use it and takes forever to dry.  I ordered this for myself so that I didnt have to deal with that feel of the other brand. The germ x is what I am used to and it works well without leaving weird slimy feeling.  Each of these bottles looks like it will refill my smaller pump bottle 3 times.

Contrary to what some people are saying, this is in fact the real Germ-X. Is it a different formula than normal, Yes! Is it still the real this, also yes. I just happened to find a buy a bottle at a local CVS and it’s the same exact is this one. Looser than normal and a different scent. They must of had to change the formula due to current shortages. It’s still hand sanitizer and it still works. Nothing to be alarmed of.

This absolutely 100% not ‘original’ Germ X. It is watered down and the scent is not that of GermX. I paid a lot of money for 4 of these utility size bottles for my husband to have clean hands for our business and these are subpar at best. I wish I could return this, this product is useless.

This was a great buy! Hand sanitizers are still kind of difficult to find in my area so when I saw these for under $20 I had to purchase them even it had still had a few at home. The amount I received for the price was excellent. About the product itself; It does exactly what it’s suppose to do which is sanitize your hands. It doesn’t leave my hands dry and I do have sensitive skin. I recommend these esp at under $20 for six bottles of 32 ounces.

Great product! When I purchased these bottles of sanitizer I was nervous that they would leak in the box during shipment because of what other customers were saying in the reviews but since there were many positive reviews as well I decided to take my chances. I got lucky and my box only had one very tiny leak in one of the bottles which was from a loose cap and only a couple of drops leaked out. I think that this company should put seals on these bottles so that way even if the caps do get loose nothing will leak out during shipment. Overall very good product and one of the best deals on high quality hand sanitizer on Amazon!

Im so glad I was able to get this product. This is such a great deal and these should surely last me for a while. I do wish these came with a pump. It can be a bit tricky trying to refill my hand sanitizer bottles so I would rather this come with a pump to make things a bit easier.

Germ-X is really hard to come by and so this seemed like a good deal. The flip top of one of the bottles broke off during shipping. I only lost about 2 inches of product but I did have a slimy mess to clean up. There was a 2-3 inch gap between the top of the bottles and the top of the box - my guess is that the bottles slid repeatedly during shipping due to this poor packaging. More of a problem is that the product smells like feet (my son’s words). It does not smell like any GermX I have ever used before. I am not sure we will be able to use it due to the stench. Due to the spillage the odor was quite pungent when I opened the box! I would not order again.

This hand sanitizer has different volumes in each bottle and no seals or package wrap. It smells extremely strong, like wood alcohol. I do not think this is authentic germ-x. I work in healthcare and this hand sanitizer is very questionable! I am disappointed Amazon will not allow me to return this or give a refund. Some alcohols can be toxic to your body and I am definitely not risking my family and I getting sick from toxic hand sanitizer.

I don't usually bother to review products, but there was enough uncertainty about this one that I thought I should weigh in. Other reviews have complained about the formula or texture; apparently the GermX product they received isn't the same as it was prior to the pandemic. I cannot speak to that, but I don't particularly care whether it's true or not. The fact is that the product that I received seems likely to be as effective as any hand sanitizer. It leaves a reasonably nice scent without stickiness or residue. It may be that it has a strong alcohol scent when initially applied (compared to the original formula), but I personally don't care about that one bit. In short: I am 100% satisfied with my purchase. The product that I received doesn't have any of the problems that you associate with the cheap hand sanitizer that has apparently flooded the market. It might be slightly inferior to ultra premium hand sanitizers such as Purell, but not enough for it to matter.

Pretty sure this is not actual Germ-X. All of my bottles arrived with the seals broken. The product labels are all bubbled up like an amateur just slapped them on the bottles.  The bottles are not full and the “sanitizer” just looks like water. I will no longer purchase items like this from Amazon. The risk is too great. There is plenty of sanitizer in the stores now anyway.

My package got here faster than expected. They are definitely worth the price. My sister has severe allergies and all the other hand sanitizers I've bought have really strong chemical smells and she can't stand them. These have a really pleasant smell to them and are the only ones she can tolerate. I will definitely be buying more soon.

I also thought would never be writing a review about a hand sanitizer.  Well, here we are. Thanks to the virus I have been using this stuff after washing my hands.  This Germ-X stuff is my absolute favorite.  It doesn't smell like that fake off-brand garbage.  The fake stuff usually smells like tequila or Everclear and I think it might kill you since its made with methanol.  It's also doesn't dry my hands out or make them sticky.  Stay healthy.

Germ-X Hand Sanitizer I trust so when I found this 4 pack in bulk available I had to grab it. The scent is subtle~it’s nice. The sanitizer makes my hands feel moisturized & germ-free. Keep in mind these come with no pump. I use these to fill my close to empty smaller size sanitizer bottles. They came nicely packaged as 4 & the bottle is easy to handle. I now have a nice supply which will last my family & I awhile. Very pleased. Great value for what I paid. Definitely recommend!

The bottles were packed a small box in a larger box. When I opened the smaller box, gel coated the 4 bottles. They had no seal under the caps, 1 lid was almost off, and 2 of the bottles had leaked a good amount. I suspect these bottles were refilled with what I hope is sanitizer but am not certain. It smells like Germ X and feels like it but who knows?

I had ordered a while back and was getting ready to open a bottle. There is ZERO chance this is authentic GermX. This item has a very strange smell/stink as if they added some type of fragrance to it. Contents are VERY THIN and watered down verses the gel like authentic formula I have no idea what is in it. Based on the smell and the thinness, I am doubtful that there is any amount of alcohol in these bottles that would be effective as a germ fighter. FINAL WARNING! DO NOT BUY!

The Germ-X "Advanced" w/Aloe I purchased in late-February is the gold standard. 1. 70% Ethyl alcohol 2. Aloe which leaves skin feeling much nicer, and... 3. ...gives it a far more pleasant smell. The "Advanced" formulation is not available, so this "Original" formulation will have to do. I understood from the images that the aloe was missing, but the decrease in Ethyl alcohol, while technically acceptable, leaves me feeling a bit conned.

with recent recalls on hand sanitizers using methanol made in mexico i checked through all my bottles... older germ-x bottles clearly states it's made in USA. with these new bottles, there is no mention of the manufacturer, just the distributor. I reached out to Germ-x and Vi-Jon by email and been ignored. buy with caution!

This product is definitely not Germ-X. It smells like rotting cherry artificial cheap car air freshener. Those commenting that’s it’s real must be employees. I’m mostly aggravated at the fact that I can’t even return  product. I’m stuck with it. That’s BS.  I have the real Germ-X. That’s all we use for our special needs child. Scent and texture is way different. Not cool at all!!! I guess it’s true. You get what you pay for!

It’s legit. Yes the consistency is off. Yes the scent is different. But let’s face it, we’re in the middle of a pandemic and a lot of things are being affected including supplies to make everything that keeps us safe and healthy. At the end of the day I trust the brands that made hand sanitizer prior to all this madness and this is one product I trust.

Non-returnable product and all 4 bottles I ordered were shipped without plastic over caps. Result box soaking with hand sanitizer and crushed tops than will let the product dry before I get a quarter through the bottle. What a waste of time, shipping and fuel. Good value for money if the packaging could survive shipping
Liquid. Packaging was terrible. All 4 bottles arrived with the caps off and half empty. The sanitizer is very thin and liquid like and the sent was terrible compared to other germ x products I have.

Donation to the Sisters of the Assisted Living Home for the Elderly Ladies. With this Pandemic the Sisters do not go out into the community.  So as to protect the Home and the Sisters we Donate for their protection and the Ladies of the Home.

My husband needed a hand sanitizer for work that did not smell like liquor as he’s a recovering alcoholic. We ordered these because Germ-X brand has worked well for him. These surprisingly had a very strong cough medicine smell. To be fair, my husband didn’t mind it and intended to use them at work. Unfortunately, his coworkers could not stomach the scent, so it didn’t work out. Still, they arrived quickly and were well packaged

My package was delivered with some of the bottles leaking.  Some more than others.  The UPS driver was concerned I wouldn’t accept delivery.  I went ahead and kept them thinking I would deal with the issue thru Amazon myself.  Turns out there is no resolution to the defective packaging as I have tried different links to no avail.  *STILL*...since hand sanitizer is so hard to come by, I feel like I’m better to have it than to not.

I ordered these a second time. The first order worked well and it is legit germ x. Someone posted about it being watered down. The whole world is trying to produce mass quantities of hand sanitizer, Pre-Covid labels are just that. Labels with formulas produced before shortages. Thanks Germ X and Amazon.

These bottles came and don't have a seal on them.  One had a considerable amount less than the other bottles like someone used some of it.  Not sure what happened but i think items like this should have a seal on the inside under the cap.  Otherwise, glad to have these when there is such a shortage out there.  Haven't used any yet because I am still using the last of the sanitizer i already have so i don't know about the scent of this yet.

I bought this early 2019.  For flu prevention.  Then and now, except 1% lower alcohol, don't see much difference.  Alcohol smell but nothing offensive like some products after the covid.  Happy to see a brand i know come back to us.  Ordered 2 sets.  One box fine, the other had bottles little crushed but no leaks.  One cap was broken but still no leaks.  Thank goodness for upright delivery, ups.

I can’t prove if they kill all virus or not but I’d say they feel like alcohol, in gel form, have a good smell after use. I have been using it for a while, like after picking up packages delivered to the door, after picking up food from restaurants, and going to some stores. Last time I bought some 2 bottles of hand sanitizer from woot and that was a lie. Those 2 are pure liquid and hard to apply. I m happy with those gem-X ones.

Notice a difference between the bottle on the left vs the right?  The left one was purchased 2 months before my most recent order.  The ingredient panel has changed.  The main ingredient is now water and 1% less alcohol.  Texture wise there is a marked difference where the first one is gel-like and the newer one is runny.  Still a good product, and I understand supply shortage, I just find this sneaky.

Got this to refill some pump bottles, but smell is very bad!! I usually use Germ-X because it has minimal smell, but they must have changed how they make it or something because this stuff stinks!!! Don’t know if this was a bad batch or what.

I’m not sure about these. I threw all 4 bottles out due to the fact they each 32oz bottle arrived with the safety seal broken! One would not have been a concern, but all four?!? Each bottle had a slightly different amount of product. Also, the sanitizer seems watered down and different than the germ x I purchased from Target a few months ago. These cannot be returned, so beware.

I was excited to find this at a good price.  The box was in good shape.  I immediately could smell that something wasn't right before I opened the box.  There was a strange odor.  Turns out that the bottles were crushed and leaking everywhere.  The smell and texture was not the same as other Germx that I have purchased over the months.  The bottles were different-  different color, different color cap, flimsy.  No way to tell, but I'm fairly certain that these bottles are fake and the contents are most likely fake.

When they first arrived, the product looked legit. After a few days, though, the labels started to peel off on 3 of the 4 bottles. Given other reviews, makes me wonder if this is genuine or not. Wish I could know for sure, but wanted to share my experience so others can judge for themselves.  I guess it's better than nothing.  If it is legit, it's  a great value for the price.
Doesn’t smell like Germ-x. Has a loud funny smell. Can’t use or return.

This product arrived in a box which states "white cap" however these clearly do not have white caps.  The product seems extremely watered down.  What a waste of $24!  I'm too afraid to use them as I have no idea how reliable they actually are!

Like other reviewers I do believe this is real germ-x, it is not like any other germ-x I have purchased. It is extremely watery. If you look at the inactive ingredients you will see that water is the first ingredient (ingredients are listed in order of volume in products) on the older bottle water is the last inactive ingredient. It seems like it is watered down by the manufacturer which is very disappointing. Wish I could return it.
This is how it arrived. Broken top and spilled everywhere.

This is the ONLY brand of hand sanitizer that our family uses and trusts. It doesnt dry your hands out, and also doesnt leave a residue which is a huge plus. We buy the big bottles in bulk to refill our smaller ones. This is the only brand that I trust to use on our kids hands as well. So many other companies use harsh ingredients. We love Germ-X because they use only ingredients that should be in hand sanitzer. And you get the best bang for your buck!

I wish I would have read the most recent reviews. The scent really is terrible. It’s smells like cheap cherry vodka or a really bad porta-potty air freshener. It actually makes me nauseated, so I will not be able to use this hand sanitizer. I’ll be giving the bottles away.  I noticed other reviews that compare the ingredients label to older versions of germ-x. My hypothesis is that they changed their formula to increase production during the pandemic and are now selling off that product which is why it is so cheap. I’ve noticed the smell of other brands during the pandemic is also bad. I’ll be taking a trip to Walmart for a sniff test before buying any more hand sanitizer.

I have allergies and can only use Original Germ-X sanitizer. THIS stuff STINKS!!!  It has a VERY STRONG bad cough syrup smell. 😝 I was so eager to open my boxes (I bought two orders) and they went right back in for return. Then I see that you can’t return it!  It cannot be true “Original Germ-X” So very YUK! Run from it. (I rarely write a review, but this was so disappointing. I’d love a reply from the seller.
This is a fake product. Very watery and bottles weren't sealed. It is a shame we are trying to protect ourselves and we have to deal with fake product.

WHEN WALMART IS RIPPING YOUR HEAD OFF FOR THAT TINY LITTLE BOTTLE THIS IS PERFECT. ORDERED IT FOR OUR DEALERSHIP AND WHEN WE GET CLOSE TO RUNNING OUT I WILL BE ORDERING. THE PACKAGE WAS NOT DAMAGED AND NO LEAKAGE FROM ANY BOTTLES

Compared to the previous formula, the scent is different.  It no longer have the pleasant smell and have a very strong rubbing alcohol smell.  Also it's not as thick as the previous formula.  It also isn't fill up all the way either.  Seem like as demand for these went up, the quality went down.  I was happy I was able to score some to share with family and friends, but am disappointed in the new formula.

Got all 4 bottles, but it was very badly packaged.  1 of the bottles cap broke off and spilled out of the whole box.  See my screenshots. 1/5 packaging.  Half of the bottle poured out.  Can't get refund or partial refund for the damage shipping for this item apparently. The smell of the GermX is fine, i personally like it.  Kills germs and virus, so can't complain about that.

I would not order this product again. The caps broke on 2 bottles and liquid spilled through the box the products were packaged in and the Amazon box with the shipping label. In addition, I thought it looked watery and compared it to a bottle we have at home that I purchased from Target and it was different. Definitely more water and does not smell as strong as the other bottle.

I have a bottle of the same Germ-x 32 oz which I bought recently from Target. I compared it side to side with the bottles I received from Amazon. Same bottle shape and labels for both. Neither had been sealed, and neither had a pump. The fragrance was the same. The only difference is the bottle from Target had a thicker viscosity. I don’t think that makes a difference in the quality of the product. It’s the real thing.

I have used this product for years and was happy to be able to order some Germ-X from Amazon, especially when the off-brand hand sanitizer I bought from Walmart had such a vile scent.  I was thus very disappointed that this Germ-X hand sanitizer now has the same vile scent.  You don't want to eat any kind of hand food after using this stuff.  During a pandemic I'll take what I can get, I suppose, but this is a big disappointment.

I'm not really sure what I received from GermX since all 4 units were not sealed, taped, or anything to protect the content inside the bottle.  All 4 bottles were leaking in the box and one of the units was half empty as you can see in the pictures.  I think next time I'll stick to Purell or my local Walgreens brand.
It seems that it was only water and was not up to standard
Smells like cheap tequila-do not buy this! This is definitely not real Germ-X sanitizer.
This hand sanitizer has a stinky scent. I have a lot of germx and this isn't it..  the label says it is but the smell is musty and stinky. I'm so disappointed and feel a little scammed.

One bottle had a lid broken and none were sealed so it could be anything in the bottles. The one with a broken top had come out and was all over the box and the other bottles. It was a huge mess and you can’t get a refund or replacement when buying. I wouldn’t buy again if I knew they were unsealed and broken and no way to get your money back.

I had to pitch one bottle it was nearly empty and leaked everywhere. Product itself seems to be full much more liquid verse gel? IDK just hope it’s effective. Other bottles not filled and caps loose? Maybe manufacturer was just in a hurry?

I like that Germ-X does not smell and is very thick. I had a previous hand sanitizer that was very runny. Then I bought another which smelled badly. Then I bought this and I am very pleased.  I know some people complained that their bottles were not full but I did not have that issue. All my bottles were full. I would order this again.

I purchased the four pack of 32 ounce bottles which equaled one gallon of germX hand sanitizer. All four bottles were about 90 percent full. It is the real deal and not fake as I have always used this brand before the epidemic started. Shipping was fast and packaged great (NO LEAKS) I used a shampoo or conditioner pumper that fits perfectly on the bottles

Very nice sanitizer overall with good consistancy. Feels nice on hands and makes awesome refill for the price I picked it up for. It's just as good as other brands I like and with things as they are now we go through a lot. Arrived packed well in a four pack box inside a padded Amazon box. Totally recommended! Thank you Germ-x and Amazon , we love you!

I really don't want this on the Amazon web site.  The box was wet where the lid broke on one of them and leaked into the box.  The other three were fine.  Suggest some sort of dividers be used to prevent this from happening in the future.  I have cleaned them up and happened to have a lid that would fit.  Just a suggestion.  No remorse just know there are those out there who wouldn't be so kind.  Thank you and all the people at amazon for all you do in these times where things are in such turmoil.

The sanitizer arrived poorly packed, with literally only a large piece of paper to cushion any impact of these really delicate bottles with a brittle cap. As you can see from the photos, so much of this leaked out from the bottle due to the poor packaging, that the entire box arrived soaked, and one of the bottle even has the cap completely broke off.  The product itself is actually good, and seems to be effective at doing what it's supposed to do, but the people who pack these items need to improve their procedures considerably.

I was happy to receive this product on time as expected. It has 32 oz each bottle, which is a very good volume for the price. Each pack contains 4 bottles and I was able to share it with my family. One for myself, one for my parents, one for each of my brother and sister. The only thing is that, there is no pump. I actually need to put it into my smaller empty bottles that have pumps. But it works and I have no complaints.
The cap on one bottle broke and sanitizer was everywhere in the box. Does not come with pump, so buy one.

This Germx hand sanitizer is the best The scent is light It also moisturizes your hands.I am never without it I have to have this as I have many allergies .many others r very strong.IGermx is  great.i. would recommend this to everyone U feel clean when u use it GREAT PRODUCT GOOD PRICE THANKS AMAZON AMAXON #1

I believe this is counterfeit hand sanitizer. I noticed it does not have the same scented smell real germx has because my boss bought a identical bottle from rite aid pharmacy. And I noticed mine smells like just straight up alcohol. And his has a nice smell. This is concerning because a lot of these fake handsanatizers recalled by the FDA have dangerous levels of alcohol. And or the wrong type of alcohol. Now I am kind of worried about using this stuff

I was really worried about ordering these because of the few bad reviews. Package came nicely and didn’t have any leaks or spills. Original white cap, no seal though. First thing I did was smell and put in on my hands. Normal smell and they were filled up Basically to the top, these should last the rest of the year!

I bought these bottles at the beginning of last year. I have 1 in each of my vehicles. I still have about 20% in each vehicle. Overall I love them. When I put them on my hands, I don’t get the weird burning sensation with the other hand sanitizers on the market. I’m sure you know what I mean. Overall, it feels gentle and easy.

The bottles are packaged inside a box, inside a bigger box.  It appears the bottles were placed in the first box and then were placed below other things quite heavier as the tops of the bottles were all squashed and, worse yet, none of the bottle caps were screwed in securely.  I lost quite the volume of product in the packaging and delivery.

Great for the price! However the packaging was awful. As you can tell by the photos, one leaked and ended up being half full. Another ones lid was really loose so I’m glad I checked the lids before taking them out. The product does seem to be more watery than the Germ-X you find at the store, but still smells the same.

When I placed my order in the 12 of August, I was told the item wouldn’t be in stock until September 5-7th. I was quite surprised when I got an email on the 20 of August saying my items had shipped. I saw the reviews after I placed my order about persons saying their items came half empty or wasted in the box so I was a bit worried since it had to make its way all the way to the Bahamas. However when I received my items everything was in tact. No off putting smell (thank God cause some of these hand sanitizer now smell awful!!!). Overall I would buy again

This is NOT Germ X hand sanitizer but it’s some sort of hand sanitizer. It’s way more alcohol and super strong. There were no seals on the product and they put a glue like substance to act as a seal over opened. One bottle wasn’t as full as the others but in the others It is a lot of it whatever it is so that’s the only reason for the 2 star

I thought based on the waiting time I was getting the original Germ-x but this is not!! This is a total different forum ups with first ingredient being water!!!! Don’t buy for this price and don’t buy at all

I should have returned these. It is NOT the original moisturizing formulation. The scent is awful. I ordered 4 bottles of these because when you order the same exact product you are currently using and you receive an obviously cheaper product, well it was not worth it.

I love the product but was disappointed in the packaging. Two of the bottles had the tops broken and the other two bottles had loose caps. The box they where packed in was covered with the hand sanitizer. This box was inside another box and the outside box was upside down which allowed more leakage into that box,

Product was very poorly packaged. Ended up with open bottles in the box because caps had broken off. Two bottles had lost about a 1/4 of the product. This is very different then GermX from before the pandemic. It is very thin and watery.

I just opened the package and all of the bottles are filled up inconsistently, 2 bottles leaked and the caps were not tightened. These bottles did not come sealed.  I should have read reviews before ordering but I was too excited about the product being available and quickly purchased.  Now I’m regretting it because it appears it may not be the authentic product and this item is not eligible for return!  Basically just wasted money.  Save yourself some time and money and if you can just buy it from the store so you can make sure the product is really new/unused instead of possibly being modified or tampered with.

Got mine today. Some of the tops weren’t screwed on all the way , so 2 of them had a little come out of the top. The box inside the Amazon box they came in said GermX, and it looks like the real deal to me.

Received my hand sanitizer today. Outer box was NOT sealed at all. A piece of tape was on it but not sealed closed. The inner box was taped shut but ALL of the bottles were unscrewed and hand sanitizer leaking out. I have lost about 2-3 oz. out of each bottle.

I’m glad I bought this & extremely grateful they were available. I’m sensitive to scents so I go out of my way to purchase certain items. This is exactly what you normally can find in the store. It isn’t watered down, came quickly & was in pristine condition. I was also impressed with the amount I received and started using right away. I will definitely buy more.

I don't  buy that this is legitimate GermX.  There is no seal under the lid which was a first red flag.  It's super watery, another red flag and it doesn't smell like GermX.  It smell like that super cheap unfiltered alcohol.  The one that smell like rotting vegetation.  I was lucky enough to score a new bottle through suppliers at work and it's not anywhere near the same.
Terrible smell.

We like the consistency of the Germ X.  It's a nice thick gel and does not run all over.  The scent is fine.  I prefer the alcohol scent which dissipates quickly. It smells like it's killing the germs. We use the larger bottles to refill the small 2 oz. carry bottles. Excellent price at the time of purchase.

The sanitizer smells pretty good. I ordered 3 boxes for the company and one of them came very damaged and one of the bottles had leaked all over part of the box, and the other three were indented in. Because of a tight schedule need and not wanting to waste, we kept them but otherwise would have sent this box back. One of the lids was broken off so we will have to transfer it to another container. The other two were fine, and the larger box they all came in wasn't damaged, so it must have happened at the warehouse, rather than in transit. Some have said it was watered down, but from the gel on the box, I'd say it's pretty normal hand sanitizer. I think it will work well.

They have decided that they will take advantage of current demand and produce a much cheaper, diluted, in ineffective product, and charge a little more to make short term profit. SHAME ON THEM. Save your self. This is as effective as wetting your hand with water. IF you haven’t guessed by, I sent mine back.

I compared with the one i bought from target last month, the labels and fragrance are the same. The bottle i got from target was mint color cap. As other customer reviewer said, the company might run out of different color caps, so i was not worry too much about it. Also I understand that durning the pandemic they have to produce the product in such a short amount of time and such big demand, so i wont judge it by the label that not tapped flat and there is no seal under the cap. In general, very good product and there is no leakage in my paper box at all. Thanks a lot.

The package came double sealed (outer box, internal box) with no damage, no leakage. Each bottle was filled, probably at the 90% mark. Like many comments, this isn’t the original formula of Germ-X, but it is authentic. If everyone still doesn’t understand why, you need to know that a massive scarcity has forced hand-sanitizing manufacturers, or those transitioning their manufacturing facility to make sanitizing products, to make their own version. For many, this translates into the use of ethanol for hand-sanitizer production from Isopropyl alcohol, a colorless, flammable chemical compound often used in hand sanitizers.

I prefer the scent of the original fomula and did not realize these have a cherry scent which i happen to dislike.  I don’t like the packaging because they are easily confused with small bottled water.  I prefer  rectangular shape of the original scent but they wete not available at a multiple quantity  discount pricing.

While packaged as original Germ-X, it’s advertised as “cherry” scent and well, it’s neither. We have original Germ-X at home and this is completely different. It smells rancid like cheap baby powder sprinkled over a poop diaper. Really! It leaves your hands smelling like you’ve been changing diapers all day and the smell doesn’t quit after several washings. It’s horrendous. Just don’t buy it!
Great product, but this is supposed to be a four pack and I only received 1 bottle! Amazon refunded my order and was allowed to keep the bottle, but beware!

This is the genuine item. Great bulk buy that I can share with extended family to refill smaller pump bottles. Bottles were packaged very securely. Only slight negative is that the bottles are capped but not safety sealed. This allowed for some negligible  leakage during shipping on one of the bottles. Thanks Germ-X for ramping up production.
This was not germx, they filled it with some kind of soap. I took it to work and my hands were all sticky and gross. Do not buy.

great hand sanitizer for use during this pandemic.  it doesn't have any bad smell.  i like the way it feels in the hands.  i bring this to the car every time i drive and bring it back into the house when im done driving.  i don't leave it in the car as it causes some weird chemical transformation - causes these lumps when in use when i left it in the car in the past.

First set of these I purchased were fine. Smelled like regular Germ X. I got them back in April. Now in June I repurchased them and I cannot stand the smell. It smells like pure tequila or vodka. It feels fine on my hands and I’m sure it’s legit but I cannot stand the smell. Makes me want to puke so I will try to give these away to whomever doesn’t mind the strong alcohol smell.
They changed the formula, but I don't blame them due to the shortage. It still disinfects. You may need to use more, but I purchased these 4 32oz ones for $19... C'mon, dirt cheap.
Definitely watery and not the usually formula. I wish I had known before purchasing. Got a gallon of hand sanitizer at Costco for only 15 bucks. Not a good deal.

Much better than Wal-Mart brand (great value) sanitizer I have been using which felt really sticky after use. This doesn’t feel sticky at all. I bought it on sale for around $12 which makes it a great value for money. Only downside is the packing, one of the 4 bottles came with broken top that spilled in the box. Other than that product is great.

Several bottles had leaked, this is due to the caps were 1/2 way off and the bottles were laying down instead of standing up in a box with the arrow pointing up. And this is much thinner than it was before. What I received did not have a bad odor as some have said, so other than a few ounces leaked, mine is good.

Ordered this, product came damaged (box was beaten up bad and two were crushed. Amazon sent me another in replacement. All in all good price for the quantity. Using these to refill hand pumps. I wish it were completely sent free, but it smells better than most. Works well (I think!!!)

I bought these a few times and never had issues. So I would definitely buy again. However the shipment this time wasn’t as perfect. The bottles were all dented and alot were 3/4 full. No sign of leaking but a few lids weren’t screwed all the way on. I’m happy I got them during this time tho.
Packaged well, fast delivery. Product is as pictured. However, the consistence is a bit thinner than I remember Pre pandemic. Either way. I'm satisfied.

I've tried other hand sanitizers, some will leave your hands too dry because they're all alcohol, others will leave a residue on your hands because they have too much aloe or other chemicals.  This seems to have the perfect balance between the two.  I use it a half dozen times in a day sometimes and 5 minutes after using it, it's like nothing even happened.  No dryness, no sticky residue.

I was very concerned about the quality when I read all the bad reviews. I was pleasantly surprised that my order came and it’s definitely Germ-x. No leaks from the bottles and the consistency was good. Smelled like Germ-x and went on without feeling sticky like other disinfectants. Great price too.

I would have given it 0 star if I could. Ordered 2 package so 8 bottles - guess what? ALL bottles came crushed. Most of them were leaked horribly. The ones that did not leak were not full at all and were definitely used already. And be aware - it is NOT returnable. Do NOT buy this especially now that hand sanitizer is readily available all over the place.

The sanitizer I received smells the same as it always does. Previous reviews made me not want to purchase this item but it’s perfectly fine. One of the bottles was not filled to the top but it had enough. I see them in the stores looking the same way. I would purchase again.

I was afraid to buy as other reviewers said their contents leaked.  Mine was fine.  I smelled these bottles and compared to an old one that I had, same exact scent and consistency.  A few of the labels were wrinkled but I think that was a rush in the manufacturing process.

The Germ-x was packed with no protection.  So one of the bottles busted.  Not a big deal as there are three more.  But product was lost... all that was needed was a little air cushion in the middle of the box. Aside from that I am 100% happy with the product.  Great smell,  not sticky!

I disliked the smell of the stuff that was in the bottle from Day 1, and I fell allergic to it on day 1. I have used Germ-X for years and thought I would try this thinking it would be it but it's not. It's has a nasty smell to it and Buyer beware.

Nope! Scent is NOT original. This stuff literally has a scent that won't go away. Very strong perfume smell that doesn't even wash off with soap and water. Have some original germ-x and it has a pleasant smell. Clearly the formula is different and item is non returnable. Now have 12 10 ounce bottles that won't use. Feel deceived but am thankful out only $10.

Glad that this is available again. There seems to be a light scent not mentioned in the description. But I could've overlooked it. It is thinner than last year but I can live w/it. It's not runny...I dislike the watery ones. Gave away one bottle to my BFF. Still have plenty.
Do not buy! It is basically water with a hint of sanitizer in it.
Yes, this product smells bad. Think, gas station hand soap. But it does not dry out your hands. So take it as it is.

These arrived soon after I placed my order. All bottles arrived intact, however, the bottles themselves are not sealed & have varying amounts of the sanitizer in them (not all are 32 oz). Therefore, whether or not this is the genuine product is up for debate. It does have a “typical” tolerable smell, unlike some of these newer hand sanitizers. Not being sealed, I guess I can only hope it’s the actual Germ-X brand and effective as indicated.

Glad we were able to find this when it was available. It's a great buy. The only regret is that we didn't realize that the ethyl alcohol percentage is 62%. We aim to buy hand sanitizers that have an alcohol percentage that is 70% or higher. But I'm sure it still works effectively.

I have used Germ-X for years and don’t think this is the real stuff. The scent smells more like grain alcohol and it is very watery. I am very familiar with how it feels and smells and this wasn’t it. The bottles arrived not sealed and one of the caps was just sitting on top. It seems the real product may have been removed and replaced with a homemade variety, and there’s no telling what the ingredients are or even if it is safe to use. I wish I hadn't tried it, because I have no idea what I just put on my hands. UPDATE: My hands turned very raw and red shortly after using this.

...guess that's what happens when you ship 48 small bottles of hand sanitizer in a bag, loose... THEY OPEN. EVERY SINGLE bottle had to be tightened when I opened the bag... I guess this doesn't ship in a sealed box, just thrown in a bag. Just beware that if you get the delivery and your first words are "Man, I can smell the hand sanitizer!" .. it's for a reason.

This is either a total fake product or someone has doctored it. It's REALLY watered down. and I would steer clear. None of the caps were sealed.  I’ve posted a pic of a legit bottle on the left. You can see the thickness and the “bubbles” in the real one.  Stay clear.
There is no seal that prevents tampering from happening. Please be careful

Very well packaged.  All 4 bottles were in a small box (which was placed in a bigger box) so they couldn't move around during shipping.  Very happy to be able to get these during the pandemic at a good price.

Our family loves this brand. This is a GREAT value. Huge bottles. Germ-X doesn't have an offensive smell like some other brands out there. I have tried some hand sanitizers that I put a little squirt on my hands and I can't stomach the smell and can't wash my hands enough to get rid of the smell.  We recommend this hand sanitizer and this seller is offering a great deal.
