I read the reviews and saw so many arriving damaged and leaking. Because of the brand and the great price, I decided to take a chance. I was very happy when they arrived today and not a single one was damaged or leaking. It is 62% ethyl alcohol, which will do the job per the CDC. Smells like rubbing alcohol to me. Much better than the tequila smell of some others we purchased.  It is more watery than I'm used to, but I think the thickening agents are in short supply. Happy to have a good supply on hand for the upcoming fall and winter season!

THE ABSOLUTE BEST HAND SANITIZER MADE EVER. I will stock up and wait (if needed) for this brand before even considering another brand. Others dry out hands. **I will be trying Dove's Moisturizing Foaming Hand Sanitizer to see if I like that one as well.**

I received my case of Germ-X today and all of the bottles were full and undamaged. The expiration date is 05/2022 and they are genuine product. I will say the packaging was odd. The box was placed inside of a larger box filled with paper. But this did not cause any damage or spillage to the product.

I like this sanitizer, and feel its a good value. Obviously, thats why I buy it!!! One of the boxes had the lids loose on almost every bottle, and one bottle was about half full from spillage. The other box the lids were loose and the bottles were wet, and one bottle had lost about a quarter or slightly less, but they were all messy with spillage. I'm hoping I will get one bottle to replace what had spilled. Of course its a breeze to clean up, so that part isn't a big deal.

First and foremost let me say GermX is a dependable product. It doesn’t stink like most hand sanitizers and is very effective. I am absolutely disappointed in the shipping though. All four the bottles I received have been damaged, broken tops and leaking. They have to figure out how to ship better.

One of the bottles were open and leaked all over the box. I had to use it, so I didn’t have time to return it. I was filling up 2 oz hand sanitizer bottles and there was suppose to be leftover, but I didn’t have enough to fill it out. I bought 60 2 oz bottles and 128 oz of the hand sanitizer and still had 5 of the 2 oz bottles empty.

Received order with Bottles having the product code and Best Buy date at top of bottle.  Other than 1 of the bottles being half full, the product was delivered in good condition with no leaks.  Great price for actual GermX product. Beware I had ordered earlier 2 bottles from Office Depot for over $30.00 that were damaged, leaked product all over the place, bottles with no code or use by date that smelt like a skunk.  Threw the product out and tried to leave a review advising I thought it was a fraudulent product.  It was moderated and I was advised they would not post my review.

Great price, but bottles are not filled to the top, there's a substantial bit of product, about 10% missing and this isn't the advanced formula, so only 62% alcohol, still will do the job for the price, but definitely lower quality than I'm used to out of germ-x.
I was shorted on one of my orders.. I got a few. On one order I got 2 instead of 4..... while I’m happy to have it, who the hell do I contact to make it right???
I am happy with the product itself but the packaging could use improvements so that it doesn't leak.

Yay Amazon did it again!! Happy to finally find some sanitizer online and this one even that it was back ordered Amazon shipped fast and it came one box inside a bigger box for better protection. I already went through 1 bottle and donated another one for a good cause.

Finally came... I find it odd that the bottles are not sealed but whatever. Smells like alcohol so I guess it will kill some germs. I much prefer Purell though. Very watery... Really doesn't seem legit. Maybe the company that makes it cut some corners to make a quick profit during the pandemic.

Initially when I bought this I thought I was getting a good deal being that 4 bottles of germs hand sanitizer was about $17. However, now I feel like I got bamboozled. I literally just received these items and let me just say I was deeply disturbed as the bottles look tampered with. Two of the bottles have dish soap lids and don’t look original. I have no idea what I received in those bottles. As you can see in the picture some bottles have more liquid than others. The bottles were sticky and also the bag they were wrapped in was pretty gross. I had to wash my hands immediately after. I won’t be buying from this seller again.

I was afraid when reading some of the comments of product being fake. Idk if some got the real deal and some us did not! First of all! I got mine unsealed! Some are missing product and I’m pretty sure the tops do not belong to this. The product is super watery, no gel at all, smells like alcohol but Im pretty sure is just water with some alcohol. Super disappointed!!!

The actual product(s) arrived quickly and was as expected, except for the damaged containers. Two bottles had damaged lids, one of which had been completely torn off. Better packaging would have prevented this. Needless to say, I didn't get the volume of sanitizer I paid for. The box, on the other hand, was fairly germ free! Also, I wanted to add that I compared the bottle's labeling, ingredients (active, inactive, and order of ingredients), smell, and viscosity to a recent Office Dep. purchase. Everything was exactly same. Seems to be legit.

It was more thinner solution  than I had thought. It is not 70% alcohol like CDC recommended for use during COVID-19. I’m sure it will work for most applications but doesn’t meet the guidelines. Value was good for lots of bottles but not what I had expected as quality for this brand.

One of the bottles cams opened upon arrival so some of the contents spilled. It seems more runny than what I remember. The scent is not as bad as the other sanitizers I’ve used which smells overwhelmingly strong. I can use it without having to put lotion on afterwards to cover up the smell.

Got scammed! Be very careful when ordering! I purchased 4 Germ-x bottles, 32 ounces each for a total of 128 ounces according to the ad. When the order came today I received a box of 48 CT, 2 ounce  bottles equaling a total of only 96 ounces. I was shorted 32 ounces of hand sanitizer. Very deceptive selling methods. I would not have ordered if I knew I was going to be shorted and not given the right size bottles or the correct amount of sanitizer. Please redo ad to reflect proper order sizes and totals. False information on ad.
Not sure if it's real I have a another bottle of the same product and like many reviews it is more water down. Also it has a stronger smell of alcohol. The bottle is not sealed.
Bottles not packed safely, arrived dented and leaking, very watery, not like original. Not recommended.

I believe this product is not legit germ-x hand sanitizer. The seal was already broken on each container. They were not filled the entire way up. One of the tops of my bottles looked like it had already been used as the lid appeared used. Very disappointed. Read reviews before purchasing and even though they were mixed I still chanced it. Trying to return this product but no luck. Do not buy.

It's the sanitizer we all know is best for the job - easy to use and not watery and runny.  It doesn't cost much more than the cheap stuff that flows off your hands and onto the floor before you can rub it on.  Buy it while you can. .

I am very disappointed with this purchase. This is not authentic germ-x, it’s basically water. And on top of that each bottle came with 1/4+ missing from the bottle like it wasn’t filled all the way. None of the bottles were sealed either. Will not purchase again, too many mixed reviews & dissatisfied with the product/service overall.

After reading other reviews, I was worried that I’d get knock off that a customer took picture of. Mine is the real GermX. Has bubbles in it. Paid more but Covid is spiking and got four large bottles 32 oz) to refill small bottles. Happy with purchase.
We have used hand sanitizer long before Covid 19.  We have always been happy with Germ X.  Seller offered the product at a very fair price and delivered one day earlier then promised..

Arrived in good condition. The quality and the smell is good. No sticky gel. The quality we expect from this brand is well maintained. It was nice to find it from amazon for the regular price . Like it better than the equate or any other store brands.

I will admit they are authentic the smell and texture is the same as the Germ X the only flaw I saw and its a major one is that most bottles and I bought four packages of four all had leaks the caps were not sealed correctly and it caused leaks on I believe 10 of the bottles and the fact that there's no inner seal as well from the bottle to the cap well that also has raised some questions but yea be prepared to have some type of leakage due to poor packaging and not verifying that product is closed correctly
Finally after a few weeks I got these. There is none anywhere near me. These are big bottles and they smell good. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is they are not filled all the way to the top.

I don't know why people are saying that it is fake when it absolutely isn't. As a former teacher, I am used to buying hand sanitizer in bulk. It came fast and it was a very good value for what is being charged for hand sanitizer these days. Since I still do private tutoring I'm very glad I was able to purchase this as I was running out and school just started back.

Wow the packaging was incredible! I was half expecting half the content to have spilled out but nope. Got delivered intact. It was double packed and a great amount of cushion inside! Doesn’t smell great but doesn’t smell terribly bad as either. It does seem watered down a little as others have said. But for the price it is good enough.

Terrible foul scent when you put it on, then sickeningly perfumey once it dries. I don't remember Germ X smelling this way in the past; it must be some new formula. Regret buying it as it cannot be returned. It's going in the donation bin!

I waited until I could find the GermX hand sanitizer because I know it is a little thicker than most, which allows you to  use it without the worry of it dripping off your hands.  Well, I guess these were more watered down because they are as bad as the generic ones.  I was not happy with this at all.

I am not sure if this is the real thing. Fist, the top is green instead of clear. Second, when you peel off the seal it comes right off, it seems like it was just put on top and not sealed. Last, I don’t smell that alcohol smell, I compared it to my other Germ-X and this one smells bogus. I just wasted my money as I do not want to use these, better be safe than sorry.
The Product was delivered earlier. Unfortunately, one of the bottles was damaged. However, still a great deal. I hope this product will be available again soon.

I bought this a few months ago to have it on hand for when my pump bottles would run out.  Same exact brand (supposedly) with identical labels.  Yet this stuff stinks like that disgusting tequila smell of other cheap brands.  The stuff I bought from Wal-Mart has the sweet Germ-X smell I am used to.

Excellent form factor, odd lingering smell. Kind of like leftovers from a gin factory. A few leaked a little during shipping. I’m kind of surprised Amazon gets away with shipping flammable liquid without more hazmat protection.

As a lot of the reviews are stating, this is definitely not actual Germ-X. The lids were loose and not sealed. 1 bottle was broken. The consistency is not the same as well. It is a lot runnier than actual Germ-X. It has a different smell as well. I have a little Germ-X left and I took a picture of the differences between the 2. Since it's from Amazon, I assume they put their "own" brand in them. It's a lot like some other companies brands of sanitizer I've used with everything going on.

Can’t tell wether this is real or not, but if it’s original they definitely changed their formula. I’ve used Germ-X many, many times before and the stuff I received is WAY more watery and smells like those cheap “tequila” hand sanitizers. Nothing like the Germ-X ive used before.
Rids your hands from coo ties.  Don’t use on private parts as it burns them up.
Glad it was in stock. Now have plenty. Price is high but so is everything else! Still happy to find.

It’s not a gel. Easy to fill your travel container but too much comes out if you’re not careful. Scent is a little strong. It does it’s job of sanitizing, of course. I gave two bottles to family members. One will last a very long time.
This did not seem like the original. Very runny! Seems altered, don’t buy!

Package was damp. When I opened the outer box I could see that the inner box was damp. When I opened the inner box I saw that one bottle of the GermX was opened and empty and the hand sanitizer was all over the other bottles.

All 4 bottles arrived with the safety seals broken and the sanitizer seems runny. It smells like GermX but since they were opened, they could be filled with any chemical mixture. Luckily I was able to get a refund after contacting customer service and explaining that I had to throw away the bottles.

Weill let’s see. 3 out of the 4 bottles despite the pushed in tops were ok. Hopefully I will be able open them and pour in other bottles. The 4th bottle was in horrible shape. The lid came off and all the sanitizer emptied out onto the other 3 bottles. I would recommend not buying this. Go to an actual store to buy.
It's a little waterier than normal, but it seems all hand sanitizers are.  But it doesn't smell like raw alcohol, so it's a win in my book.
It’s light and has a subtle scent. Not overwhelming. Packaged well. In fact, the 4 bottles are in a box and that box in a bigger, cushioned box. Good value for the money.

Bottles are much bigger than they look and they last forever. I use them to fill up my little bottles for my purse and I will be on the first bottle forever. Great product and price and quality and quantity! Thanks!
Product were not sealed and one top broke and leaked. I bought this for a school. Not sure they will accept it since bottles are not sealed.
These came in a sealed box and nothing leaked!  Very pleased with this order.  I also ordered a set for my mom and those arrived in the same condition.

Great value for top label hand sanitizer!! Germ X has been around for a long time so I feel safe using it. Some off label we mixing in toxic ingredients to their hand sanitizers and people were have major skin reasons to it.

All 4 bottles arrived fine, no spills. However, each bottle is a bit watery for a "gel", especially their brand. I used this to refill a Germ-X pump bottle that I already had and it definitely is coming out looser(?) than before. It also has a weird smell. Not sure if they changed the formula but this definitely has a different scent- not a fresh/clean scent like when I purchased it in store before.

I purchased the 12-pack of 10oz bottles because it was cheaper than the 8oz ones (duh, no brainer). However, as soon as I got the bottles and opened one I noticed this awful scent. Unfortunately they all smell like sickly sweet cherry medicine. It’s a horrible scent and totally unexpected because the bottles in the store don’t have an odor at all. Maybe that’s why they were almost half the price of the smaller bottles.

It is very difficult to contact supplier. I would like either a partial refund or a replacement item for the one bottle that was defective. You can see, the box was received in good condition. It appears the top of a bottle was not secure. Please contact me.  Thank you
Smells like straight tequila!  instead of getting alcohol that's accidentally hand sanitizer I feel like I got hand sanitizer that's accidentally alcohol.

i just received another shipment of these cause the first time was super pleased but after getting todays shipment it is definitely not real germ x it smells like walmarts brand equate  also the labels are wrinkled up so that leads me to believe they are slapping a germ x label on generic sanitizer

I've ordered this several times with no issues. Hand sanitizer is supposed to be runny.. Looks like all my other germ x. Labels aren't perfect on each package bu that doesn't bother me. New lids this time I haven't seen these before. Bottles are sealed but 2 seals were broken/loose

The product lacks security seal.  3 of the bottles are loosely closed and one of them spilled into the other bottles.  Lost about 8 ounces of the product.  If bottled and distributed by a third party, product looks watered down. Unfortunately, I ordered a second set before this shipment Has arrived.

Well.. I could smell it before opening the box so it definitely deserves an awesome 5 stars for scent. In all seriousness, it was packaged and transported horribly so it deserves a zero out of five stars for packaging. The hand sanitizer was seeping into the second layer of packaging and there is a good 30% of hand sanitizer missing from one of the four bottles. Two of the four bottles were open. Good product, terrible packaging.
This product is not Germ-X. It is a horrible imitation. Do not waste your money on this item.

This would be a great buy if the maker would just screw the top on the bottles which would prevent all the bottles from spilling out leaking into the box. Please screw the tops on  I want to receive new intact bottles not leaking bottles.

I personally think this price is great!  I’m saving more buying this than in my own stores where I live! I got them in great shape as well....not any damage or leakage at all!  Just being honest for everyone.

I purchased this product excited that it would be the same Germ-X that I have always used. This is NOT their same formula. This smells like the same cheap stuff that I got from some some off brand on Groupon. I am really disappointed. If I'm being honest, the smell reminds me of some really bottom shelf tequila. I'm sure it works the same, maybe? I don't know, but I do know that it is not the original Germ-X. It has the funny smell, and and it super watery. Think twice before you buy unless you don't mind the differences.

This product seems a little more watery than the ones found at Wal-Mart/Target/etc and does not smell like Germ-X. The bottles came in a box inside an Amazon box that was partially damaged. These bottles are not seal or tighten and was leaking when arrived. While these are more inexpensive than the ones found at the stores, I’m not sure if I will buy it again.
Glad to get these!  There were no leaks and Full in bottle. They are as described and expected and  scent and texture are just fine, and do not feel much residue after use.

I am gald I was able to get this hand sanitizer in this Pandemic. This is not as watery as most of the hand sanitizers in the market now a days. However, I did notice that it is bit more sticky than the previous lot I bought. Overall, it does the job and is doesn't cost you arm and leg.

Bought it, so we’ll not waste it, but.... It is absolutely NOT the same GermX product as purchased early in the Covid days. Reeks of cheap industrial soap, like the McDonald’s or truck stop soap with a strong chemical odor that you can smell on your hands a hour later. Not recommended. The Amazon Brand is better now.

I’m not sure why there’s so many complaints. The one on the left is from Amazon, the right is from Target. They both have the same scent and consistency. The ones from Amazon are REAL! You have to realize that they’re mass producing this at a higher rate than they’ve ever had to. It’s great for me.

The bottle had dried product around the opening. Loose caps. Product spilled and the smell was completely off it smelled almost like a sweet sent. It made hands very stick. After I put the sanitizer on my hands I washed my hand and my hands were still sticky. Something is off about this product.

What a deal. Name brand hand sanitizer. Smells ok and keeps your hands from drying up. Package was strong enough to be bent at the corner and no problem with the contents.  At $26 a great value for the money.

Agree with other reviews that few things seem "fishy": unequal fill of bottles, smell of unrefined whiskey (read: homemade alcohol) but for my purpose of sanitizing food packages coming from the supermarket, this is good enough.

These bottle are poorly packaged and sealed. This is my second time ordering this brand with the flip top. The flip top gets loose easily and there is always some spillage in the box when delivered. There is no seal. Recommend for the manufacturer or amazon to tape the caps to prevent item from spilling. My other complaint as well is that the bottle is never full specifically for these bottle types. Either the products evaporate because the caps are loose, they spill, or the manufacturer does not fill to top. I don’t seem to have issue with other items from Germ-X.
Not as thick as the "original" formula that I'm familiar with. It's pretty runny, but not as bad as some other brands

This is not authentic germx. I bought despite mixed reviews. The sanitizer is liquidy. The seals were all broken and placed back on to pass as if they were new. Also the label on the bottle looks like it was placed on (they are crooked, have bubbles and creases). To the people saying they received authentic hand sanitizer that’s good for you but also note that your bottles (which you say are authentic) are different from the bottles of the people saying they are fake. So do not dismiss those claims. I did get a refund so I will be tossing them out due to the fact I have no idea what is actually in the bottles

Did not come with a pump sprayer so best for refilling other bottles.  Used this with a friend who was having chemo/radiation before Covid and never had a problem so bought more when available for Covid.

The bottles were filled at all different levels. They were not sealed which made me a little concerned. Not sure why they wouldn’t be sealed? Two of the bottles were slightly damaged - sides pushed in. The scent of the product smells legit but the packaging and inconsistent levels of sanitizers was strange.

This is not germ x hand sanitizer!!! The smell of it is so horrible it makes me nauseous and I literally have to open a window so the smell can leave! Also it seems as if it was refilled with some other concoction as it has no seal under cap! Please I’m begging you DO NOT BUY! If I could return I absolutely would!

The item is described as a 4 pack of 32oz bottles. I received the box for 4, but it only contained 3 bottles. I'm still glad to have sanitizer from a reputable brand but the missing bottle is pretty strange.

If you want to receive partially filled bottles without any seal whatsoever then this is the product for you. The gel is quite watery, quite different from the consistency I am used to with this brand. The effectiveness of this gel is rather questionable.

This product is terrible. Apparently , the smell has changed.This is not the original scent. I even tried adding a pleasant scent to the bottle of sanitizer but it did not help
The product containing more liquid than like solid this product should been a little bit thicker it felt like it was  more water

I am thankful for the product during this time in the world but I will NOT be buying again!!! The product came open and leaked out!!!! It’s very watery. I don’t think this is the ORIGINAL germ-x.... guess that’s why it’s so cheap.  And since ordering the FDA HAS recalled some hand sanitizer and I hope This isn’t one they recalled and they slapped a germ-x sticker on them.
Great product. Used this in smaller bottles for car, purse and work. Honest and on time delivery.

Received those germ-X hand sanitizer today ! They look fine! Only one problem was those bottles are NOT come seal and no pumps come with it!  Overall they’re good price .. and very happy with my purchase!

Extremely disappointed. One of the bottles spilled everywhere. There is no seal and the lids look like they do not even belong on the bottle they are so loose. The product itself is watered down. Very runny and I am familiar with the germ x brand. Guess you get what you pay for but buyer beware.

First the positive, great value for a product in HIGH demand for both myself and my at risk parents. However, there’s concern with the authenticity of the product. This doesn’t have the clear color of the other Germ-X I purchased. Also, when I received it, I could smell the alcohol before I opened the box since it had leaked from the bottles. That was pretty disappointing as you can see from the pic only one seemingly didn’t spill.  Better packaging would be great in the future.
I’m trying to attach a picture but won’t let me. Product is okay, but the bottles are all banged up and some are more filled than others.

Used this for a long time and other recent orders —this is definitely watered down and 3/4 full. If this violates the standard for 62% alcohol it would be a serious issue.  I was going to have it lab  tested  if someone cannot confirm this lot with the manufacturer/ provider - based on the comments on here this would not be an isolated issue.

Received product in a timely fashion. One bottle came with a broken cap and sanitizer slightly spilled onto the box. The manufacturer should consider sealing this product. I received exactly four bottles

I received it today, and compared to the other bottle I bought on January. Yes, it’s more watery than the old one as many reviews mentioned. I don’t think it’s fake product. I thought just the manufacture changed the ingredients during the this special time.

The sanitizers arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Doesn’t have any less than the regular bottles you’ll buy at the store. I am a bit concern about the alcohol percent since it only has 62% but it’s better than nothing.

It was very difficult to buying hand sanitizer in past few months, let alone a reasonable price. Thanks Amazon and Germ-X. It smells good, has 62% alcohol and my hands don’t feel dry after using it. Definitely recommend it to everyone.

This product is very deceiving. I had bought a germ-x hand sanitizer at my local target. It had a nice hand sanitizer smell and it had a lot of thick bubbles where as, the ones I got from amazon were very disappointing. They had different active ingredients, all four from amazon were really watery and stunk like witch hazel and rubbing alcohol. I was NOT satisfied with this purchase.

The box was in another box but it was obvious that something was leaking. One top was completely off. Item leaked through the box and wasted my sanitizer. I wish I had a way to contact the distributer. I did not send it back because I needed it and a replacement would not have arrived in time. I did not get my value for the dollar.
Although the packaging was double boxed, the caps were loose on two bottles and the sanitizer was spilled. Three bottles were very dented, and it just didn't smell like GermX.

Love this brand.... and for the price hand sanitizer is going for... this was a steal... Price was approximately 1 bottle for $4 which is 4 times more for a dollar less than most stores in upstate  NY right  now (July/August 2020)!

I purchased this product about two months ago.... the product I received today was not anything like I was expecting. Two of the bottles had the caps on very loosely and  the some of the sanitizer had leaked out. Of the bottles that were tightly capped, one of the bottles was missing some sanitizer.  The sanitizer in all the bottles  had a unpleasant odor. My last order of the same brand had no odor at all. I'm disappointed in this sanitizer order.

Seems to be actual Germ-x. I compared the smell and texture to a much smaller bottle and both were similar. I did notice that the seal on all 4 bottles was not sealed. Im guessing the glue didnt hold up to the alcohol in the liquid. Would buy again.
Love this brand! Other hand sanitizers smell horrible so I was relieved this one smells good! During the pandemic, hand sanitizer is a must and these are my go to, highly recommend!
Great sanitizer Made in USA.  Non sticky formula like many other new ones on the market.  Light pleasing scent and night and day difference from ones with strong tequila odors

Not happy that only one bottle was fully filled when I received it. None of the sanitizers had a seal and the 3 that aren’t full the tops weren’t fully screwed on and were leaking in the box when I received it despite the tight packaging. Glad more didn’t leak out.
This hand sanitizer does not feel like the brand that can be purchased in the store.
From beginning of the pandemic I’ve preferred other brands but GERM-X has been a excellent hand sanitizer. Comes in all sizes. Would highly recommend this Germ-X as a 2nd option to Plurel.

So everything would have been fine with the product but the packaging was very poorly. As one bottle came empty because it spilt all overboxes. And a second bottle halfway empty. One bottle has a dent on there. Out the four bottles only one came out perfect. Very disappointing in the packaging.

We appreciate that germ-x didn't steer to the nasty smelling, watery hand san that is everywhere now. The packaging however left for loosened lids & lost product. If they could find a way to address that, we would indeed buy more.

the hand sanitizer is watery due to the pandemic but still efficient. the smell is the first thing you notice about this product. its a bit runny and smelly but its a small price to pay for clean hands.  the smell thankfully doesnt linger too long and dissapears quickly.

Just what I wanted!  So many hand sanitizers are scented with perfume - y smells .. I just wanted an unscented sanitizer and this fit the bill.  During the start of the pandemic, sanitizer in stores was near impossible to find.  Found this 4 pack online at a reasonable price.  Will buy this again before my stash gets low!
I use this a lot and bought in Oct. for $33.44 now the same item and number of bottles is $49.00 this is Nov not even a month.  Talk about taking advantage of Covid
WARNING DO NOT BUY!!! THESE ARE NOT ORIGINAL AND THEY SMELL HORRIBLE! Flimsy containers and half paste stickers!!! Please do not waste your money! I will definitely be returning these!!!

These hand sanitizers are definitely not the OG GermX . They smell horrible 🤢🤮

This stuff smells terrible I would never buy it again!

This was a total mess. Two bottles were spilled completely out and the whole box was all wet. It wasn’t packaged correctly at all. Lids were not taped for them to not open.

This is a must have item for me at least. I needed this item I could not find in most stores at this present time. Needed it for work, family and to be safe. Great item.
These came ahead of schedule which was great. There isn't as much of a gel consistency as GermX usually is. Other than that, works great and smells nice after it dries.
I dont know why people are questioning if this is true Germ X brand- It is.  I love this smell and doesn't leave a your hands sticky.  Great price for the amount you get, totally recommend.
I purchased another brand when this wasn't available and they had a recall luckyily before I used it. I will stick to mainstream brands like this one so I know it is safe for me and my family.
This stuff is SUPER THIN AND WATERY. I’m not used to having hand sanitizer be SO THIN AND WATERY... so I’m not certain this is the actual hand sanitizer as stated.

Called vi Jon which owns germ x regarding the source of glycerin, it is from cow/pig fat Confirmed 2/1/21 for all those that care about this info. Wish companies would just write it on ingredients so I don’t have to waste my time calling them up individually

Does not smell like Germ-x I've smelled before. Which again was the reason I ordered this. Would not recommend.

2 bottles were complete and full. One bottle was open, cap folded back and just over half full; one bottle was open but cap nearly on it and one-third was leaked out. Makes one think that the bottles should have been shrink-wrapped sealed before shipping. Will not order these kinds of items again.

These came well packaged, no leaks. They did seem a bit liquid-like, but I figured that they might be because it was over 90 degrees outside and it sat on my doorstep for a while. The smell is fine and it does the job!
One of four bottle cap delivered broken. Leaked into the packing. Tried submitting return and speak live assistant to no avail, can’t return item and phone chat not connecting “frustrating”.

We bought this to stock up around the house, but was disappointed by what I received in the mail today. The package was all wet, leaving two of the bottles semi-gone. Hopefully this won’t happen to other customers in the future.

Excellent value!  This is good quality hand sanitizer.  Arrived in excellent condition.  Smells a little like watermelon, although the label doesn't mention this.  Not a strong scent.  So glad I got this!
Not listed in the ad is the fact that the alcohol content is only 62%. The CDC reccomends to use hand sanitizer with at least 70% alcohol. Amazon, this is deceptive advertising. Shame on you.

I‘m pretty sure I have never left a review on Amazon & I buy a ton stuff on here.  I was concerned at how watery the product was & the fact that the lids were not fastened. It made me wonder if it was legit Germ-x.
This hand sanitizer is so much better than other brands. It is not sticky, is a high percent of alcohol and I purchased on Prime Day, so I got a really great price.
Couldn’t believe I got 4 32oz bottles of germ-x for 4.50 a bottle. Great value
When I opened my box the top of one of my containers were broken and spilled all in the box and on my other bottles and lost a good some of my hand sanitizer for the price I paid
Excellent for refilling the pocket size and 8 oz bottles. Smell and quality are as expected. It is non-drying and has a reputation of being good quality. No surprises here.
This is not normal germ x. DO NOT BUY! It stinks and is watery and runny. I wish I could get my money back.

I do not think this is really germ x. It is just in the bottle. It smells like a homemade hand sanitizer from a brewery. There was no seal on bottles and came with loose caps. I am not able to return this per their policy but I wouldn't buy again.
Excellent quality, no sticky feeling.  Great product. Delivered today, tried to buy more & it was sold out. Packaged perfectly, no spills or cracked lids as some other reviewers had noted.

Germ-X is good sanitizer.  I purchased for my business, it's not sticky and doesn't have any weird scent. These do not have pumps, but I knew that.
These are, in fact, plastic bottles filled with hand sanitizer. Itt works - my hands are sanitized each time I use it. Thank you, GermX.

These came with no kind of seal on them. They smell different from the package that I bought from the store (same brand ) so I'm just hoping these are legit.

The deal for four large bottles was a great value.  Exactly the same as the one I was lucky to get at Target (same exact size but more $) and a few tinier ones from Walmart. I am perfectly happy with my purchase and am lucky I was able to get this deal for my family.
I buy most Germ-X sanitizer but this one is different, from the smell to the consistency of the sanitizer it is too sticky. I am unable to return. Beware, do not buy!

Absolutely thrilled to get Germ-X at such a great price during this pandemic. They came with secure flip top bottle caps which made refilling a breeze. I also have one stirring on the counter for guests to use. Very happy with my purchase.
Seems okay except the packaging was terrible.  Two bottles leaked all over the box.  The scent is an alcohol smell.  Most likely won't ever buy again.

This is apparently legit Germ-x, but it’s not the “good smelling” 63% of pre-COVID times. This stuff smells absolutely awful! Now we’re stuck with 4 bottles of it because amazon doesn’t accept returns on hand sanitizer.
Containers have no seal. Different  fill levels on all four bottles. Not a big user prior to pandemic so I cant confirm if it’s the real deal.

Value of product would be worth it, if it was properly sealed.  Upon receiving the package, it leaked through 2 boxes.  The cap on two out of the four bottles were not closed.  Of course it’s not returnable because it’s flammable.
Great price and product but everyone of the 4 bottles were broken at cap, some leakage, box soggy. Simply needed some padding for the bottles. I’ll keep since hard to find, but packaging inadequate.
This is shipped and sold by amazon they are not sitting around messing with fake hand sanitizer. Due to the pandemic Germx prob changed up their formula and speed to cope with demand. Wake up.

Purchased these and they came quick. The only issue was they came damaged and the bottles had been dented so some of the sanitizer leaked out.

I'm sure theyre real. They smell just like how I always remember germex smelling like. Not sure where people are getting it smells like that weird ugly scent that you are probably thinking about but it does not.
Great value and was glad to get. Will use to refill our dispensers and also give some to my relatives. Shipped was good but did have one small leak but not bad at all.

The caps were not fully screwed on. They were barely hanging on the top.  The bottles also did not have a plastic seal to make sure the product wasn’t tampered with. One of the bottles exploded and got all over the package; so the product was wasted.
Top not sealed.  Has very strong (not quite noxious) scent.  All I want is an alcohol hand sanitizer.  I thought it said 70% when I bought it but it is only 62%.

A different bottle was at a much lower (and quite obvious) fill level than the other three bottles. It makes one think that someone had removed quite a bit of the 'sanitizer' from one of the bottles - perhaps all four, but one was quite obviously not even close to 'full'.

The gel smells good and it is comfortable to use. I realized 128 FL OZ is a little bit too much for me. I don't go out often and it took me about 2 months to finish the 8 oz bottle.  It may take 2-3 years for me to use out them.
Excellent product for the money, way better than the off brand stuff. smells like alcohol initially but then smells nice and is also moisturizing.
It seems to be legit as long as it is straight from Amazon.  Only complaint I have is that 2 of the bottles leaked a little. Amazon needs to invest in covering the lid properly.
Buyer Beware! My bottles were not sealed and product was filled at different levels. Product was runny like water, I doubt this is authentic GermX.

I did receive this and it felt like they may have been a very hot place, or humid place.  That would make sense if they were in a warehouse that is hot.  I just hope that the wipes will be wet enough to actually clean with these.  I also hope that they are not ready to be expired.  I mean these things don’t last for ever.  I wish they would.  These are so easy to clean with and, safe to use on practically anything. Ok I just cleaned with these.  Yes it took more wipes then normal.  I usually only use these in the bathroom.  I normall uae vinegar and water to clean the house but, saw a lot of bad reviews on here.  So yes I have to agree with others they I will not buying these again.  I bought the Clorox ones on here and, they were awesome.  I think Lysol was not as good anymore or maybe just from Amazon.

Let's face it, cleaning is already a task most of us do not look forward to so why not make it easier? For me, wipes are the answer. Before these I was spraying with a cleaner that was probably spraying in places I didn't want it to, waiting for the cleaner to soak in before using paper towels to finally wipe off the food particles and spills. Now I simply grab a wipe out of the container and everything comes off in one step and I can clean with the wipe exactly where I want to, unlike a spray. The packaging makes it easy to tear off one or as many as you need and closes tightly. These work better to really help loosen and remove any stuck on food that I would usually have to scrub off with other cleaning products. I should also mention I used to buy Clorox wipes but these leave less lint than the Clorox did. I would have to wipe the lint away with a rag after cleaning with those, not saving me any time. These Lysol wipes work great, one goes a long way and they arrived in perfect condition. I'll be buying for life (until one day when I hopefully become rich and can afford a great housekeeper, that is.)

I've always been a fan of Lysol but certainly not these. Every time I try to clean with them I end up with an awful headache. I must add that I'm sensitive to fragrances and ones that bother me tend to lead to migraines like these do. Not worth it for me to go through the misery. If you don't have those types of sensitivities they may work out well.

I received these yesterday and they were a soggy mess.  When I removed the outer wrapping all of the canister labels came with it because they were soaking wet.  It's impossible to tell how many of the canisters leaked but there was a whole lot of product lost to leakage.

I compared Lysol vs Clorox wipes.  I have to said Clorox is the winner!  Why? Because Lysol wipe drys up fast. Not enough liquid solution. It’s hard to disinfect a surface when the wipe is dry.  I noticed Clorox weights 581g(78 wipes) vs Lysol only 473g(80 wipes).  Lysol is lighter, definitely dryer.

These are great for little messes that might require a bit of anti-bacterial action.  We keep them in the kitchen for things like wiping down countertops after preparing chicken or other foods that might carry bacteria.  A  quick wipe down with them on the counters, stovetop, etc. makes us all feel a little safer about what we eat and where we prepare our food.  They clean, plus give you the satisfaction of knowing that you are not only cleaning, but you are disinfecting at the same time.  A must-have for the whole house.

Just had my order arrive. It came in a plastic bag, rather than a box. Right off the bat I could smell the lemon scent before I had even removed the wipes from the bag. Then I reached in the bag and felt the moisture. It was my original intention to give these wipes to my son and his wife. After opening the plastic wrap around the containers I came across loose, torn and wet labels. There is no way I can give these to anyone. Due to the loss of liquid there is no telling how effective they will be. I do have a 2nd order going direct to my daughter in NY. I hope her shipment has better luck. Update; 5/30/20 The 2nd order arrived at my daughter's house in perfect condition. This time it was in a box and shipped out of Texas. Mine as mentioned above was in a plastic bag and shipped out of Michigan. The system will not allow me to write a different review for the new shipment. I thought it only fair to report to good results as well as the bad.

I received my package back in July and just opened them tonight...to my surprise, two of the four canisters had NO LIDS!?  Not sure if these are safe to use now!?  And I am too late to ask for a refund because I waited too long to open up the package.  Buyer beware!

I can live with the slightly cheaper container which it truly is, can't see this as real problem.as long as the product is still good, Problem is, the product has been cheapened too I actually like the new style of the wipe, in theory it seems like it would last longer BUT THE WIPES HARDLY HAVE A ENOUGH CLEANING LIQUID TO BE USEFUL. The old old one came wet, there was excess liquid in every container. This is ridiculous, this cleaning liquid costs practically nothing to make. The price is now over 25 percent higher than before. Not going to be repurchasing an overpriced roll of tiny paper towels which are barely moist.

So happy to find these and I love this product. I will be dropping most of mine of at a nurse's home who works directly with COVID patients. Please do not hoard these in these times and check in with your essential worker friends/family to see if they need any. Message from a nurse: As some of you know for 5 and a half weeks now I’ve been caring for Covid 19 patients in the ICU/Emergency Room and Step down units. In the very beginning we used a new face shield, mask and gown every time we entered a room. We are now allowed one mask every 3 shifts and one face shield forever. We depend on wipes to clean our face shields every time we exit a room. Without being able to clean these we would be passing the virus from room to room and literally be bringing it home in our cars/on our shoes to our families. We also use these wipes for shared equipment (X-ray machines, dialysis machines etc) I know these have been really hard to find, but if anyone scored some, my colleagues, patients and I would love any wipes you’d be able to share

Love these wipes for convenience! I bought a multipack for a great price back in the summer. So disappointed that the same multipack was jacked up to over $40 now with all the health concerns. Shame on Amazon for taking advantage of people!!!

The picture for this product is deceptive. It shows that it will be in a plastic can but what I received definitely wasn’t in a plastic can. It’s in a bag form instead where you open the plastic lid attached to the bag and pull out a wipe. Similar to like baby wipe packaging and one can easily get them mixed up which is why I liked the cans better. It’s not worth the trouble for me to go and return them though. They should update the image to this product so that they’re not tricking customers regarding what they will receive.

I use these everywhere at home, work, and on the go. We keep these everywhere at work when someone is sick we go on a massive cleaning spree. Wipes are in every room and we stay healthy! A tip for those that travel: put a few of these in a sandwich bag and they’ll stay good when you travel. Better, cheaper way to wipe down tray tables and arm rests. At the hotel wipe down doorknobs, light switches and the tv controller. Carry the same in car or purse and save vs buying the travel packs with their massive convenience markup. Happy travels!
Bought these before the big Corona scare. They have gone up significantly in price since my purchase.

I really miss the days when I can actually get a real deal on these but nowadays just finding these for MSRP and having availability is a blessing. I've always loved Lysol products and this is no different. The wipes have a good thickness to them and won't disintegrate or get destroyed when you're using them to sanitize your surroundings or objects. The scent is nice as well and it's really nice just having a couple delivered to your door. Would definitely buy again as they have been my go-to wise for years but as you know they can be very hard to find right now.

The post covid wipes are not as strong as the old ones (see pic for weight difference: 513g old vs. 473g for the new ones). Also, the old wipes had dimples. The new ones are flat and are thinner, less liquid (see second pic).. After all the wait i am disappointed!

Sometimes I wish the wipes were a little bigger so I could fold them over sometimes. I end up using a few for some purposes that I thought were going to be a one and done deal. I like the scent and it takes off the gross brown stuff that's under the rim of the stove burners. It won't take off a wine stain on the cheap counters at my apartment, I still have to break out spot cleaner for that. I switch out between these, Clorox and Wegmans brands and they are all pretty comparable.

I didnt open mine right after i got them. I just now did and went to look at the reviews and sure enough the same crap..every single one of mine leaked out everywhere and the labels are all torn up and everythings a huge mess. Will NOT be buying from this seller again

Four containers of glorious disinfecting wipes at a great price!  80 wipes per container and 320 wipes total in the package.  These wipes clean well and smell great.  These used to be so easy to find, now it takes a miracle to find them in the stores or on Amazon.  I have been blessed.

These are great to have around and to keep on order in case stores run out during this pandemic. We've been using them for many years though for cleaning and sanitizing inside and outdoors by The animals food area. The packaging is leak proof from our experience, and the scent is clean without being overpowering. Each towelette is a good size ..not tiny, and there are plenty wet. When we have finished using them there is still some of the liquid in the bottom of the plastic container. They're easy to open easy to dispense we've been using them for years and will continue to get these exact ones. I hope this helps you decide what to get.stay safe!

Lysol is the best brand for disinfecting stuff. My one minor complain is its packaging. Clorox has an air tight film cover on every new canister, which is helpful to prevent leak in delivery transportation. I wish Lysol does the same thing. Lysol offers a better price instead so cannot be compared with any absolute standard. Anyway, I cannot choose one from the other during this pandemic. I should snap whatever is available for sale without looking at its brand. By the way, when can I buy Solimo wipes again ?

Product is great. I keep 1 in each car, 1 under each sink, and 1 in the laundry room. I have the 4 pack set up on auto-delivery. It's like an easy button, and a safety button in one. Provides peace of mind when traveling, grocery shopping, pumping gas, and between deep cleanings and hand washings. Note: if used to wipe hands, in the car, dryness will occur. Don't use this as a substitute for hand washing or deep cleaning, but it does the trick between jobs and traveling. Very convenient. I hate the use of too much plastic, but weighing out risk/benefits, this one is a necessity.  I don't have kids in school, but if I did, there would be one in every backpack and locker. :)

Receive package today.. all 4 canisters are dented and warped. 1 had no liquid inside the canister and wipes were not moist. 2 have cracked and broken lids that have the contents exposed for drying out.  Very disappointed 😞

You HAVE to do the wipe dance if you're able to score disinfecting wipes during this pandemic! The Disinfecting Gods must know that you appreciate them! But on the real, I've used Lysol wipes even before Covid 19, and they are trustworthy and durable. They last a long time in the canisters. Just beware, when you get to the last couple pieces, that your hand might get stuck!

After a whole year I’ve finally snagged some Lysol wipes! This is the Bentley of disinfectant wipes! The design of the container is unique you can easily put your fingers in the big opening and take out a wipe or more without unscrewing the top and place the unused end into the notch and start feeding the roll. It pulls out and then rips cleanly since there are perforations. Other brands require you to constantly unscrew the top to feed the wipes that keep slipping back in or rip halfway. The scent on this is STRONG. That way my clients will know that I wiped down the treatment table and stuff. If you use it too much it may cause nasal discomfort, which is why I swap other lesser scented brands like Amazons Solimo, heh heh. Get this today before it’s gone! note as of 4/7/21 - they’re sold out :(

Arrived in a very large box with many other items. Something smushed the containers and several of them leaked cleaning fluid all over everything in the box. By the time we got the box, mildew had started to form in the cardboard under one of the Lysol containers. Everything else in the box was small: various makeups which were sealed and fine but slimy, small fidget toys which were not harmed by cleaning fluid, but also a pack of toothbrushes which had the cardboard backing all soaked, so they will need to go through the dishwasher before we put them in our mouths. Lysol is not toothpaste. Lol

I read previous reviews to know the package may come leaking or damaged, and was willing to take the risk. There was a minor amount of leaking in my box, but nothing huge. The wipes are all still wet and the labels on each canister mostly survived. I believe the canisters look different than in the photo (ie, with the clear tops instead of the yellow) because Lysol and Clorox are producing as much as they can as quickly as they can, which probably means obtaining different containers. Fine by me! Also, if you have a container running out, you can use the leftover liquid from that one and pour it into one of these if yours is too dry. Also, when I first ordered mine the delivery estimate was July 13, but it changed and they came today! I ordered these five days ago, May 23.

I bought these because I'm having such a hard time finding them in the stores. Thankfully amazon came through for me. I use these bad boys to clean pretty much everything in my house right now, as we have people who go out into the world to work and such. I know, I'm probably being crazy, but I don't really care. I used to use these to wipe my counters down in the kitchen and clean the bathrooms and all. I don't really think you can go too wrong with having a kitchen that's too clean or a bathroom that's too clean. As a side note, does anyone else really just like the scent of lemon in their kitchen? I usually prefer the fresh (blue/green) scent for the bathroom and this lemon (yellow) scent for my kitchen. Maybe that's weird, idk.

Two of the containers (the ones on the ends)  were dented and a little damaged upon arrival, but honestly I feel lucky to even have been able to get a 4 pack of these during these times, and at a good price. I hope these become more widely available for everyone soon.  Thank you!

My Lysol Disinfecting Wipes (4 containers, 80 wipes each=320 wipes with lemon-lime scent arrived today in perfect condition--no leaks, all lid openings closed, all wipes appropriately ”wet” with cleaning solution. The scent is noticeable but I imagine it will dissipate quickly. I was very worried after all the negative reviews I saw about the condition of the containers upon delivery, so I was almost afraid to open them!  I am pleased that in the midst of these difficult times with the COVID-19 virus attacking the USA and everyone ordering disinfecting products that these wipes arrived in a timely manner in perfect condition. I look forward to cleaning my countertops and doorknobs with this product. That should help keep the COVID-19 virus at bay. Stay healthy everyone:  wash your hands and stay home!

One of the best products for disinfecting and doesn’t disappoint. The package comes with 4 bottles with 80 wipes each. The scent is not too strong so that’s a plus. As long as you keep the lid closed every time you use a wipe, these could last a long time. I rather go with a well known brand than those generic alcohol wipes

Any time I have purchased any type of cleaning or sanitizing wipe they have always had a seal on the container. Upon opening these I discovered none of them were sealed, there was no fluid inside and they were barely moist enough to use, and two of the containers had this reddish brownish tint inside of the wipes. These hardly seem sanitary or something I would want to wipe high use items down with.

The liquid leaked out of the canisters.  3 canisters all the wipers were bone dry and the fourth was almost bone dry.  Leakage caused the labels to become wet and they came off the canisters.  I will get Clorox the nest time, they put an air tight seal then the lid.

The tops of these wipes' containers easily open.  Put them sideways in the box and it makes it even worse!  That's the way I received them, wet on the outside.  Hopefully, they retained enough liquid to be useful.  They smell horrible!!!  I had put something atop them and the stench (don't smell anything like lemon or lime!) leached onto it almost immediately.  I'm guessing because the tops aren't a tight seal.  I put tape around the tops of the ones I'm not yet using because I want to keep the smelly liquid in and the stench out!  Next time I'm (hopefully) buying the ones from the local store which closed perfectly and had a nice smell.

Love this product. Definitely prefer to Clorox wipes. Haven’t been able to find since the pandemic. Was lucky to get the 4 pack for 12.99. And came about 2 weeks earlier than expected date. Only thing I don’t like is the snap lid doesn't snap as easily as the ones I used to get in the stores when I could a actually find them. So make sure you press down so it’s fully snapped or they’ll run dry.

This had leaked all over the box making everything smell (& taste) like it that came with this. I threw over $90 worth of items away because of the leak. PROS: Not exp. All wipes seem to hold its moisture & tops close fine for a tight seal. CONS: POORLY PACKAGED. Liquid from ALL containers leaked all over my other items in the box. The box was so saturated in the liquid that the bottom was tearing open & this was a big box. I will be removing this from my sub & save.

Lysol Disinfecting Wipes washes off pesky scum or stains with a few wipes, and the lemon & lime scent is pleasant and maintains its aroma for a whole hour. The smell is slightly strong, so if you have a sensitive nose, I would suggest wearing a mask. Discovering that its use can also work on electronics was surprising, and after testing the wipes on my laptop, phone, electronic accessories, and game consoles, I have considered purchasing more in bulk very soon. The wipes kill bacteria on their surfaces, which is especially acknowledgeable during the current COVID-19 pandemic. For those who eat-and-game with messy hands, these wipes do their job at leaving controllers and screens with a smooth, shiny, and dry finish with just one wipe alone. In fact, a single wipe can stay moist for an extended period of time, so do not be concerned if a wipe will not be enough to clean a single area or device.

Great wipes! I use these disinfecting wipes for just about everything. I keep a cannister in the kitchen and each bathroom.  I use these for wiping down countertops, appliances, toilets and tubs.  I also use these for wiping down doors and door knobs and our electronics. These came well packaged and I was very happy to receive them since they are so hard to find lately.

When I was able to order these sanitizing wipes online I felt like I won the lottery during this pandemic (Covid-19).  They arrived in their usual sealed packaging (it’s a 4-pack) in a typical shipping box.  For whatever reason, the Lysol company no longer had a seal on the tops of the individual containers of wipes and once I opened the sealed packaging there was liquid all throughout.  As I am in desperate need of wipes, I found 3 of the containers leaked only a little bit, while the 4th is quite dry.  I am keeping them but will continue to search for them in a store rather than ship them.

So glad that Amazon have it, and lucky me that I was able to bought 3 sets of them. Price is so good and it arrived as soon as it was back in stock, which was about 3 days. I shared them with my friends and  neighbors since all of us can’t buy it from anywhere. Nowadays, sanitizers, masks and back in stock everywhere but Disinfectant wipes are still soooo hard to get! Can’t find it anywhere, Target walmart and local convenience stores. I only have 2 bottles left, and my family and I use many of it everyday. We have to keep things disinfectant for our 3months old baby and a 6yrs old boy.
Yes!!!! It’s Lysol! Exactly how I remembered!  I was surprised when my order went through and even more surprised when it arrived! Smells amazing and works great!
Are these legitimate Lysol wipes? Labels falling off.. Packages all leaking. Not the usual container they are in. Would not buy these from Amazon again

Ok, I really like these wipes. They hold on together well and are an easy way to wipe down countertops, light switches, packages and more. BUT the new 'stronger' redesign they just did means it's impossible to separate them. Now instead of easily tearing off a wipe I have to painstakingly fan out about two wipes, search for the division, and attempt to pull apart starting right from the edge. Even then it still ends up ripping the wipes down the edge half the time:( Can you please go back to the old version?

There are Lysol wipes under all of our sinks because they are that handle (heck I we even have them in the trucks and boat).  They are easy to operator with one hand, pop the top and pull one out, clean up the mess and move on with your day.  It is just that simple.  They are gentle enough to use on just about all surfaces and they are durable enough to use for light scrubbing.

I bought a lot of hoarded, afraid of them are out of stock. Now every time i go to the supermarket to buy things, I always wipe them with disinfectant wipes before I move them to the house. I feel the quality of this purchase is not as good as before, easy to get dry, not much soap in the container anymore. Disappointed!
I bought two cases of this and it is clearly fake. They don't smell like lysol wipes AND the labels are fake looking and peeling off (like they were quickly glued.
Just what I was expecting. Lysol wipes. They do the job. Not a fan of the chemical smell because I am used to more earthy cleaning products. They were packages well and arrived without damage.

Normally the wipes are good but whoever packaged them did a poor job. They put them in a bag vs a box and the bag must've been handled hard and the pack was ripped leading to 2 of the containers having the tops opened &wipes were mostly dried out. Given it's so hard to find wipes I did keep the rest. The undamaged containers worked as expected & cleaned well. Scent is ok...a little strong.  Not sure if this is how the wipes are always shipped (in a bag vs a box) or if mine were a fluke.

I was so excited to finally catch these available that I blindly ordered. After I read the reviews I almost cancelled but decided to just go with it. I mean, I've not been able to find any since March anyways. They just came in. ABSOLUTELY NO ISSUES! They were packaged properly, no leaks, no dents, just perfect. I cannot believe how much I missed the smell of these wipes too! Maybe they're just a hit or miss when ordering, but I definitely received a hit!!!

Lysol wipes are the only wipes my sensitive smell senses can handle. I used to buy these religiously every other month pre-pandemic. This is the first package I have finally been able to get since  feb 2020 which was the last time I was ever able to find some. I was so worried I’d get a box of old or imitation wipes based on sites and reviews I’d seen. But these were just like the ones I used to buy from the stores. Very relieved and happy! My only disapproval was the delivery person left my box randomly nearby my apartment rather than right in front of my door. They could have made 7 steps and put it right in front of my door and avoid possible confusion and possible theft as it was left at the staircase.

Cleans well and disinfects as lysol always has.  Packaging is difficult to keep wipes in the "tear" area and wipes do not tear every time, so pull carefully.  Other than that they are great.  If the wipes fall on their side, the liquid does not all drain out, which is a vast improvement over past designs.  I carry a pack in my car so I can sanitize when I go into the store if they do not have wipes available for shoppers.  I did this before covid but now it is even more important.  I just wish they were in stock more often, but can't blame that on the sellers, just covid and hoarders.  Great product, as always.

These are my absolute go to item for cleaning my counters, stove, refrigerator and both bathrooms. I keep a container of these in my laundry room, kitchen, both bathrooms, family room and living room. It’s great to have them handy for a quick wipe down of different items. I have  Multiple Sclerosis and it’s crucial that I stay as healthy as possible. These wipes are a huge help to me. The scent is clean and fresh without being overwhelming. I will definitely keep buying them.

I remember the Lysol brand from when I was a kid.  I'm not sure how long it has been around, but I remember my school used to use it and my parents used it.  Now we are using it.  The wipes are good at cleaning down counters, doors, etc. The scent smells refreshing and clean.  The containers do not leak - I found one that had been knocked on its side.  I thought it was be dried out.  Nope.  Still had the cleaner inside.

all 4 tubes i received didn't have any sort of sealed protective film under the lid to prevent liquid from leaking out like my clorox wipes had.  It got everywhere.  I almost feel like the company cut corners in a hurry to make product available to the masses given the current health crisis.  I am also afraid that these are going to dry out much faster without being completely sealed.

These wipes are great!  The packages contain more liquid disinfectant than some other brands, so you can clean off a larger surface with just one wipe. This also means that all wipes are wet, and you shouldn’t have to discard the last ones in the container.  (Some other brands’ wipes tend to dry up before you use the entire container.) I’ve deducted one star because of the scent.  Although it’s not a bad smell, it’s a bit strong and could be too much for those who are sensitive to scented products.

I had to check back often but I finally managed to get some! They arrived quickly in great condition. The wipes smell great and work well. They are well saturated. For anyone who has concerns for them not being individually sealed. I checked the one I purchased from the store and it was not individually sealed either. The store brand or Clorox brand wasn’t sealed either. I’ve always stocked up on these because I have a cat that likes to jump on the counters. Thank you for having these available!
The product was completely damaged and the colors of the packaging were leaking onto the yellow containers itself. Looks as if the product was left in the sun for a long time.

The product was not properly wrapped, just thrown in an overly large box.  Not surprisingly, it leaked all over.  This will greatly reduce the shelf life for the wipes, as they will now dry out before I can possibly use them all.  This is a shame, since I’ve ordered these wipes in the past with no problems.  If you must order these, I would highly recommend that you don’t order anything else that could be damaged due to leaking.

I have an auto immune disorder. It has been extremely difficult to find the products needed to protect myself from the virus .Ive been trying since January. Thrilled that Amazon had Lysol wipes & other needed items . Friends & family need items also . Keep this great product coming ! Thank-you!

We keep a tub of this in the car to wipe off drive through cups of soda and even the straw wrappers. Car handles, steering wheel, actually all car surfaces. It removed grime on the glove box that the car detailer wasn't able to. Inside the house we wipe down our groceries before putting them away. Go Lysol wipes!!

Great price, fast shipping, great product its been difficult finding things to keep our home as clean as possible with 4 children we could never be too careful and with this pandemic going on we were lucky to find them and be able to share with family who has not been able to find these like us.

Needed this during the pandemic and can always count on Lysol for quality. Good, strong sheets won’t break when you wipe down things and I like the lemon scent. Some of the lids were cracked because I think everyone is in a rush to get product out but i just used some masking tape to seal the cracks so they wouldn’t dry out. I’m satisfied overall.

I'm curious if this is the real product since there are so many imitations out there given that everyone is buying every wipe product due to the Corona Virus.  I opened the box and the lids had popped off a few of the containers and the ones with the tops off had wipes that were already yellowing.  None of the containers a factory seal (inside plastic liner).  So, I'm curious if anyone knows if this is an imitation product or if Lysol brand doesn't come with inner seal.  Little scared to use if not really a Lysol product.

Lysol wipes are back! For a year or so it has been a challenge finding these wipes from the Covid Pandemic. We were having to use bleach and water to disinfect which doesn't have a pleasant smell like the Lysol wipes but worked. Going to get a couple to have a little back-up and use conservatively.  Thanks Amazon for getting these back in stock. You guys are AWESOME!!! 😜

Bought for the virus problem. It is a good product, but ONE of the cannisters was damaged in shipping, cracking the outside, letting cloths dry some. BUT, I would buy again. Bulk priced and availability was good.

So happy with my purchase!!! I was nervous from some of the reviews in the past but my package came with no issues what so ever. Also delivered faster than I was originally expecting. Priced fairly too! Thank you so much!!! I haven’t been able to find any since early March anywhere. I’m mad at myself for not buying 2 packages. Will buy again if they have more for sure.

I like Lysol wipes because they don't have bleach.  They work great for everything that needs cleaning. Your masks, microwave, countertops, stove.  You name it can it gives a good clean. I like the multipack because it comes out with a better valve vs a single container.  The scent is nice too. It's a nice citrus smell. Not too strong, but noticeable. I definitely recommend it.

Lysol, you done played yourself. As many others here have caught on, there was a change in the quality of the wipes in the past year or two. Previously, they were strong and lint free, which is why I preferred these over those nasty Chlorox wipes that would leave fibers all over the place. Now that each sheet is thinner and smaller, there's not a clear winner anymore.

Is it just me or the product came without any seal on top of the plastic bottle? The other bottles I purchased individually came with the plastic seal when you open up the lid. This product, all of the 4 bottles, does not have sealant. This will dry the sheets before I use them. I would not recommend it u less you’re using the whole bottles in short period of time

These were exactly as advertised and at a good price, they have a plesent citrus/ clean smell. They are stronger than the original as advertised. Amazon asked if they are good for deep cleaning and I gave them a 3/5 on deep cleaning as I considered if something needs deep cleaned it will require another method however I am pleased with the product as I have used them before and for a quick wipe down of most hard non porous surface these cant really be beat

I was trilled to be able to order the highly desirable Lysol disinfecting wipes via Amazon during the Labor Day weekend.  The order was originally on back order until October, but to my surprise, the package arrived early on 9/9.  Unlike other brands' disinfecting wipes I bought at the office supply stores, the Lysol wipes have a very refreshing Lemon smell.  I've been using them for cleaning my phone, the counter top and the mail packages and they work great!  These wipes are "must have" during the pandemic.  I'm hoping to buy more when they are back in stock.

I'm using these to refill the containers that I bought last time, because the packaging for this was extremely poor quality. The blue dye was rubbing off the shrinkwrap.  The labels on the containers were sticking to each other, so I had to peel them off. And the wipes weren't dried out, but they weren't that wet either. Luckily, the containers I bought last time still have a lot of liquid left in them.

Excellent product itself. The managing of shipping is what I question I received the first time perfectly ok no issues Sad I am ordering again and now says unable to ship to my location and not because is not available because that is understood for high demand,but because I am in Puerto Rico..You serious?? Really??? What changed??
Came intact and in a brown box so no one knew what was inside lol! They appear to be exactly as expected and no leakage.

I trust this brand. It’s proven to work. Each wipe is strong so you only need one and don’t have to double up.  Never dried out. Far better than seventh generation in terms of strength and efficacy though of course it’s not a natural product. I use them for disinfecting purposes only and softer cleansers for elsewhere. Amazon is amazing. When it’s in stock - it’s the ideal place for purchase.

I'm not a germ freak but like to make sure important areas are disinfected to avoid illness. Multi purpose Use just about everywhere, kitchen, bathroom door knobs so easy and convenient to use.  A must around the house and cleaning up after cooking or helping to prevent samanella when working with chicken.  Easy removal from container with pleasant scent. Economical love the fact I don't have to run out to buy when I run out having multi pack on hand.

Love the product but extremely disappointed in the way it was received.  I rarely write a bad review,  but when this arrived,  the box wasn't even all the way sealed,  it looked like it had been through a professional football game en route and the product leaked everywhere,  not even sure if there's any left on the wipes!!! Extremely,  extremely disappointed.

Always have to have Lysol wipes on hand. I have these on subscription and get a regular delivery of them. So glad I do because I use them for so many things around the house. When you have little ones in school and they're bringing home all kinds of germs and viruses he can't be too careful. these are great for a quick wipe-down of door knobs and light switches and anything else that's touched on a regular basis. They're all so great when cleaning.
These aren’t thick enough for deep cleaning, but scent and value are good. Normally the canisters have a plastic seal under the lid, but one lid was busted and they’re not sealed.

We have been using a lot of wipes lately, so I'm always happy when Amazon has them back in stock. They arrived in perfect condition - no leaks.  I personally prefer the smell of these to the Clorox ones, but your opinion may differ.  We pour any left over liquid from the empty container into the new container to make sure the wipes stay really wet.

These are obviously fake. Such a shame people are taking advantage of this difficult time. Label is not the same as they normal are and the label material feels like a cheaper piece of paper and it keeps peeling off. The seal was also different look like someone vacuum sealed it on. Was not the same as when I typically buy at the store.
I was nervous because of the reviews about damaged products. Mine were packed well and came 100% perfect. So grateful! Great buy!
Love these wipes. They are great for cleaning everything from toilets, to potty accidents, to wiping tables. Great value for the price, when you are lucky to get it in stock! The scent is great too!

Either packaged wet or leaked en-route. What a mess... The wipes themselves seem fine but I don't know what percentage of the liquid leaked out. By how much was the usable life of the wipes shortened as a result?
Product did not have a seal under the lids and some liquid escaped during shipment. I've purchased previous containers of lysol wipes and they've had foil seals under the lid.
Thank You for selling this product during this pandemic 🙌🏽, the price was excellent while so many people are hiking the price. It cleans very well on solid surfaces.
Smells great and works well just can’t find them anymore with covid-19 going on. Good luck and stay clean!
Two of the four containers had blood on them.  I put them back in the box, washed my hands, and sent back. Highly unlikely that this is a Lysol product.

Good price and love this product but a lot of the containers were leaking when I undid the shrink wrap.... and even some seeped through to the box. Luckily didn’t ruin anything else in my shipment but leak proof packaging for shipping would be great - otherwise might just go back to purchasing in store
Glad to have secured this order as it has been difficult to get these locally.  One of the 4 packs had broken out of it’s outer plastic covering and there was some minor leakage in the box

This is my first time to use lysol disinfecting wipes, most of time i use the other one. I would this it "may" clean up the surface, - because i don't know, but i trust the brand. The biggest problem is it smells like BLEACH badly. If you dont like the smell, do NOT buy this one.

I must not have read carefully enough when ordering these canisters. I thought I was going to be shipped three large canisters. I received three large and three small canisters. The small canisters are perfect for the car. I ordered these for myself and a set as a gift to my brother. He was very pleased to have a small canister for each of their cars.

I should have read the reviews about the leaking but these were a good price so I just added them to my cart. The containers did leak into the plastic bubble wrap they were in, and out of it. Luckily I only had one other item in the box and it was in a cardboard box which got wet, but the insides were fine. I love Lysol and use a lot of their products I just didn't think I'd have to clean up a mess and throw out three full but dry containers.

There were no protective seals inside the plastic covers so there was some leakage once I opened the box, as the scent was very obvious. The scent is rather odd and actually kind of stinks. I've used Lysol wipes before and don't recall them smelling like this. Yuck. The wipes themselves are thick and strong and well saturated.  I've used about 20 sheets from one canister so far.

These things work great when you want to wipe stuff down in a pinch. However they are not built like they used to be. If you need to lightly scrub something off your stove or counter, sink, or bathroom etc. they start to come apart and leave little balls of lint everywhere. They clean without leaving a streak on most countertops etc. But, the quality of the wipe has degraded for sure *probably for eco reasons*

Came in quick and had no issues with leaking or any potential problem you might expect. Item arrived exactly as described and as advertised. I am satisfied and happy with my purchase at the moment and see no issues with the quality and effectiveness of the product as it works perfectly as intended.

Canceling my subscription to this item now that they’re sending a larger quantity of smaller containers. The large containers were easy to store (since there aren’t 70 in a pack), and one container lasted a good while. Now that they’ve switched to this smaller container size there are too many containers in one shipment and they’re constantly running out...so I have to stop, got to storage and find a new one, then dispose of the one(s) emptied.  It disrupts the flow of energy and gets annoying,
