Okay, so I just got my first batch in through the Subscribe and save; Unfortunately, I will be cancelling all future orders of this specific item because even though it's just soap & very good working soap at that, it smells HORRIBLE!! Oh my God, it smells exactly like an old lady's perm!! I thought I would be able to ignore the scent & would get used to it, but instead, it just gets worse every time I use it. Needless to say, i will gifting the entire box of these soaps to anyone willing to take them - If anyone needs me, I will be in search of a liquid soap that doesn't make me want to wretch everytime I use it 😂

The smell is awful, it smells faintly of nail polish remover. Even worse, the scent lingers for hours. The whole box is going into the trash. The order arrived quickly so I recommend the seller, just not this product.

This is my favorite hand soap, it was sold out everywhere (along with all other soaps). I was price gouged heavily by paying 20 dollars for 6. In normal times this item sells for about 98 cents per bottle. Shame on Amazon. I still gave 5 stars because the soap itself is excellent.

I love this handsoap. It is the only one I can use for my extremely sensitive skin. Used to buy these all the time - this EXACT item. It was a great deal - about $6.00 for 6 bottles. Why is it 3 times the amount now? Price gouging during a pandemic for hand soap is pretty disgusting.  What a shame, because this is a great soap.

I bought these hand soaps for a shop I manage, but I ended up keeping one for myself because I love the scent!  It's a strong, clean scent that does linger on the skin, so if you're looking for something subtle this might not be the soap for you.  I personally adore it and will be purchasing more for myself.

Had allergic reaction to this Softsoap, which says made in Canada. The formula is different from the original available at Costco. Thought I’d washed too many time yesterday, when my hands were red, with micro cuts at the end of day.  Testing today on rested skin and untouched skin resulted in Needle-like sensation, followed by red skin on both areas. Have not had such a bad reaction with Softsoap before.

Dear Makers of Softsoap (and anyone considering buying), Thank you for creating a product named so aptly for how it works, and for how much it has helped me during the CoVid crisis. I have an immunosuppressed child, and always have been a hand washer, even before CoVid. In the early days of this event, I came to Amazon just seeking to buy bulk soap, and migrated to yours. As a classroom teacher, I used so much soap and always have been behind the curve, treating my chapped hands, rubbed raw from constant washing. I realized this morning as I again washed to my favorite 20 second tune, enjoying the light scent of my Softsoap pump, that my hands really are soft after washing, no chafing, just happy bubbles. The product washes off cleanly without residue...this is the perfect soap of our times. I’m sending sets to all of my first line friends and I thank you again for this product. For those considering buying, I give this the highest praise. Buy some for yourself and put it in a care package for someone it will bless.

I know it's only hand soap, but I have adored this scent for years! Hard to describe, but it truly emulates what I consider a fresh, crisp, clean aroma. So airy and pleasant; not flowery, artificial or overpowering in any way.  If anything, 'Fresh Breeze' is a tad too subtle - that's how much I enjoy this fragrance! Had a difficult time finding it at our local brick-and-mortars, so I was thrilled to find it on Amazon.  Another less obvious plus: factory packaged in a relatively thick, but compact box. Perfect for storing and tough enough to endure shipping sans damage / leakage - always a concern when purchasing online. (Can't count the number of compromised orders I've received due to poor packing. Are you listening, Amazon?) No worries here though. In short, thrilled with everything about this item!

Soap. This is soap. I guess that I like this soap. I do not have any issues with this soap. I have used Softsoap products for many years. It is of the liquid variety that I wanted and came in a 6 pack for about the same price as I would find in a store. The scent is not my preference but is fine considering that it is soap (I'm more of a vanilla fan myself). In the face of the pandemic, though, I will not scoff at  the scent of an essential product that quickly became hard to find (thanks, hoarders). It is not the worst scent that I have had from the Softsoap brand and the rest of it is exactly what I expected...soap. I have used it daily since I received it and have not, to my knowledge, been infected with any diseases...therefore, I would assume that it works? If you can get it, you will not have to go to the store for a while as it came in a package of 6 and that was the most important part for me. Therefore, I give this a rating of soap. I would say good soap. Now I implore you, as part of the human race, to use soap multiple times per day, especially after using a restroom (you know who you are so don't make this awkward for the rest of us). This one, in my humble and decidedly unprofessional opinion, works. Soap.

Absolutely perfect and every way. No allergic reaction for me. Easy to unpack and easy to use. I can put one and each bathroom and one in the kitchen sink then I have three backups. Very good item when you move into an apartment. Makes my hands silky soft. Doubles as body and face wash. Gentle on the skin; gets rid of oil buildup on skin. Item was not damaged in any way. They all came perfectly sealed and easy enough to open. Just twist the top, set it by the sink, done. Soap pump installed just like that. Absolutely perfect.

I was overpaying for foam hand soaps for years at a popular bath store in the mall.  I’ve wisened up and am now saving money on affordable hand soap. This particular purchase was cheaper than going to the dollar store.  While this review is not for foam hand soap I will say my kids are getting their hands cleaner with this liquid soap because they have to suds it up themselves.  It’s a nice scent bath and kitchen.

At this time with all of us washing our hands more & much of the country still in heating season (drier air). This particular soap Softsoap Liquid hand soap w/Alo Vera  not only cleans your hands but moisturizes them as well. Do NOT concern yourself that it doesn't say DISINFECT! IF you wash your hands properly warm water for at LEAST 20 SECONDS 2 verses of Happy Birthday, you are DISINFECTED & you aren't contributing to the advancement of DISINFECTANT resistant germs and viruses by putting DISINFECTANT soap into your ground water!

Love this soapz. Smells nice too. Great price when I purchased it. Soap is difficult because I have very sensitive skin and other formulations if Softsoap I am allergic too. This does not bother my eczema either

Great price for a boatload of hand soap.  Softsoap is gentle enough to save my hands in dry winter months.  If this was the only soap I ever had to use I probably wouldn't even need a moisturizer, but, unfortunately, the soap at my work is made from the acidic blood of angry demons.
Like borderline eczema. Not sure if this is knock off soft soap or just bs marketing, but did the opposite of soothing and moisturizing!
The fresh scent Softsoap smells...good  At first I thought it was going to be too strong, but it hasn't been.  It works as well as all the other kinds of Softsoap that I've used.

This is a great deal, my family always buys this brand Softsoap for handwash soap. I am not a fan of Foam soap so this one is perfect, I like that it doesn’t just sanitize my hands, it moisturize it too. I love to was mh my hands every 5 minutes when I cook, so now I have an ample supply, there was 6 in a box. It is very Perfect for my very dry handS in Winter.

Excellent texture. Not runny and watery as other soaps on the market. Also, not all soaps are moisturizing. These keep my hands smooth and smelling pleasant. I really like this scent and certain. I transfer these soaps into my glass and electronic soap dispensers. If you found this review helpful to you , please vote below so I may improve my future reviews . Thanks.

This soap dries my skin and smells like an ultra strong old man’s cologne. The only reason why I won’t be returning it is because Colgate-Palmolive (the manufacturer of SoftSoap) engages in draconian price gouging on all their other products during this pandemic. P.S Amazon, for the love of God, open your eyes on price gouging by this manufacturer, thanks.

Good soap, decent price, doesn't fry yet still feels clean which a bug one on my part. Hubby likes a soap to feel smooth and not dry his hands out since he refuses to wear hand cream and washes his hands all the time. However I like the heavy duty soaps like mechanics and farmers use that strip everything from my hands. In all fairness I often have grease, oil, or manure from chickens cows and horses on me so I like to feel “squeaky” clean. Now if I am still extra dirty I will use my farmers soap but for normal use and if I just do the morning feeding chores I use this soap. It still feels clean without drying out my hands. The only con is that the last oz doesn't pump. Completely wasted. I try to save it by adding water or saving them up and combining them which takes forever since the soap is thick and does “run” into another bottle easily. So I would like to see the pump get atleast a bit more out of the bottom. As you can see in my pictures it is a decent amount left in the bottom. Now my son has seen me add water to the last bit and it has become a fun project if he slips away to the bathroom to play with the soap and sink while Mommy is distracted. So fun times for me 🙄
Soap tends to dry my hands out. So I usually look for soaps that are "hand" friendly. I don't have this problem with Softsoap. It never dries my hands out.
Great product arrived in tact no spills or broken bottles

I liked the subtle fragrance that doesn't stay on my hands for hours. Functionally, the dispenser is easy to push and is stable without toppling over. The soap itself is nice and doesn't dry out my hands too badly like some other soap.  I was dressing some raw salmon today and this soap was able to wash away all the fishy smell. I'm pretty pleased with it.
Love the smell. Kid friendly. Promotes clean hands

The soap is thick and lathers well, but the scent is too strong for me.  I mean wow.  I wasn't expecting that!  The price is good, but I can't use it because the smell bothers me so much.  I don't think there's anything wrong with the soap.  I just really hate the floral scent.  So if you have any sensitivities to perfumes, this is probably not a good soap for you.  On the other hand, if you really like floral scents, this soap provides that!

First, this is a review on the product, so 5 stars for the fresh scent and lathering of the product. Zero stars for the shipping, as all 6 bottles had "non-fixable" dents in them. And they came packed in a small box, then inside a larger box, so I can't even blame the delivery man for the damage.  They were all beat up before they were packed into the larger box. Luckily, I will be transferring the product from it's original package to my decorative pump bottles.

Scent is nice, pretty pearl color and soap is moisturing. My go to soap during this pandemic! I wash my hands around 10-20 times a day with most being at 20 seconds, before and after I eat. I also made it a habit to wash my hands if I touch a common area. This is because I have roommates with children and it's flu/cold season. So you would think my hands would get pretty dry with all this washing but they're actually not and I'm not sick either! I also don't need to apply hand lotion as often as I would need with another soap brand. My only con is the condition of the products upon arrival. One of the bottles leaked and the other has a cracked spout so I would need to transfer them to another bottle that is safe to use. Other than that, it's the best bang for your buck!
The Softsoap Fresh Breeze smells so good!  I have it by every sink in the house, and I love it so much I get it on auto ship!
This is the only scent of hand soap that everyone in my family likes! Doesn’t dry out your hands too much in the winter.

I've been using Softsoap liquid hand soap for years.  But with the Rona, it has for a while been extremely difficult to get Softsoap in the stores.  When this became available, I jumped on it.  Overall, the soap itself is fine.  Get your hands wet, apply soap, lather and wash.  Much more sanitary than sharing a bar of soap. The biggest issue I had was with this particular Fresh Breeze scent.  It was not a mild scent, and more of an extremely strong perfume like scent. So if you can overcome the scent, it's a really good value.

Meh, it's soap. Probably helpful on the moisturizing front. Hopefully kills any covid on my hands. Kinda annoying that it has long strings of soap that don't want to let go of the pump when using, so that I end up with soap mess on the counter half the time. But whatever. It's soap, it helps me clean my hands, and my hands aren't dry and cracking from using dish soap like I was before.

Have been using this hand soap for years and couldn't be more thankful that it's available on Amazon! Having sensitive skin can sometimes be a problem with these "harsh" hand soaps out there. Luckily, this soap allows me to wash my hands numerous times throughout the day without causing irritation or severe dry-out. Really like this soap and recommended to any who are considering.

You can't go wrong with Softsoap!  I love that this comes in a 6 pack and has a ridiculously low price.  I have a bottle in each of our bathrooms and one in the kitchen.  Each bottle contains 7.5oz of Softsoap.  I chose the clean aloe vera scent as its my favorite.  It doesn't just wash/clean our hands, it moisturizes as well which is especially important now that its winter and our hands are dry and chapped.  These bottles will last quite some time and the price can't be beat.  I do think when its time to order more Softsoap I will go ahead and order this same item-6 bottles rather than the large refill bottle.  These bottles are perfect for home/office/restaurant bathrooms, kitchens.

I love Soft Soap and have been using it for a few years now.  The aloe vera variety is one that makes me feel good and like I'm helping my  hands.  It refreshes my body and feels like I'm moisturizing.  When I got it, the price was pretty good.  Some sellers and different varieties  can be over priced.  Quite frankly, I have often been able to purchase Soft Soap for 99 cents a bottle from places like Safeway.  Buying online tends to be a more expensive proposition, so when I saw this group of 6 being offered for $5.94, I jumped on it, especially since it was available for subscribe and save which meant the cost was actually less.  I'll keep hoping to find some of my favorite other varieties offered at this same, reasonable price.  At any rate, I think it's a great product.
It's a basic hand soap from SoftSoap but the scent is actually really nice! It's not overwhelming or mild, just perfect. I got this as a 6-pack so value wise it's great bang for your buck.

I usually get the large bottles of soft soap from Costco to refill my soap dispensers but when I realized I was out and the Soap shortage hit us, I was lucky to find this deal. Though the scent is nice and light, seems more faint than normal and soft seems thinner and more watery than other soft soap I’ve used (even in this scent). Seems like a watered down product and dried out my hands.

The scent is refreshing and light. The 6 pack comes in the perfect packaging. It is perforated so that you can create a cut out (as seen in my picture) so you can store your extra bottles in your linen closet without them falling down constantly.  We are on our 2nd bottle already! A lot of hand washing lately 😉

I purchased these thinking they would be "anti bacterial" which they are not.  But, soap is soap and should work fine.  I just wish they would have been clearer on the label on  Amazon . I would have given a 5 for anti bacterial. The bottles are on the small size which is sort of nice as they don't take up a lot of space especially on the bathroom counter.

I bought this soap and my hands broke out in rashes.  I used another soap, and my hands were fine.  I then tried this soap again, and I don't know, something in it, made my hands red and itchy.  And then I used this other soap, and my hands went back to amazing again.  I prefer to use soaps that don't have all these weird chemicals or dyes, because the soaps without chemicals or dyes seem to be very good to my hands.  I do not recommend this soap at all.

While this is probably decent liquid soap it's not for me. The price is reasonable, it's pretty creamy is non drying on the hands. My biggest issue with it is the fragrance!! It's overwhelming not tolerable for me, admittedly I am sensitive to fragrance so I know there's many people that will enjoy the soap. For me it's bag to the drawing board. I can't technically recommend it.

I bought this to replace an empty dispenser of presumably the same soap. However, the earlier version, which had the same labels and even the same SKU number,  dispensed foam; while this just dispenses a glop of soap gel. And in fact the short video included with the photos shows it dispensing foam. I called Colgate-Palmolive to ask about this, and was told that the formulation was changed in 2019 to a non-foaming formulation. In my opinion, this should be made clear in the description; and the video showing it dispensing foam should be removed or replaced, to avoid the false impression that this dispenses foam.

I have brought this soap for myself, sent some to my mother, and also to my daughter.  It is packaged well. The soap produces a nice lather and has a gentle scent. It leaves your hands feeling smooth. Normally I have to apply lotion after washing my hands, but not after using this aloe soap. Definitely worth the money. Shipped quickly.

While having to wash my hands multiple times a day because of everything that's going on I found out that my hard and getting uncomfortably dry because of the many hand washes throughout the day with the soup I was using. Which results in having to using a moisturizer. This  solves this problem by combining the soup and the moisturizer together in one so now I'm not very worried about my hands getting dry and I am actually more motivated to wash my hands more often.  The package is very hand and has a bargain price in my opinion. I'm very happy with it.

Good design!!! You apply pressure to the top,,and a "squirt" of liquid stones out the spout!!! Rubbing hands vigorously together creates a "lather" that will clean your hands!!! Its an ingenious idea,and I googled it and found the process is known as "washing your hands"  I recommend it

I bought this soap during the covid-19 pandemic. So my choices were not that many, the scent even after  washing it off my hands still remainded on my hands.To the point if i rubbed my eyes they started to itch and burn. After using this soap less about Halfway Gone. It started to make my hands itch like crazy!!!! So I gave over 12 bottles to my sister to try. I told her what happened to me. And then said to my sister hope you have better luck. Needless to say I needed to repurchase a different soap.

It’s good soap but the straw doesn’t reach to the bottom so in each of the containers there’s probably at least a couple days worth of soap dispensing that cannot be reached because of the design. Otherwise overall good product.

The soap is ok, but when I opened the box there was soap covering the outside of the bottles and the inside of box. Out of the 6 bottles, 5 did not have the tops screwed on all the way which caused them to leak in transit. Horrible mess, besides the fact that I paid for 6, but lost probably the equivalent of 1 full bottle. But the soap itself is ok, I just won't order again due to the leakage.

Can't tell if like soap. Came from seller named Quality Photo with so much soap leaking out of the package it got everywhere include on fabric furniture. I don't know how I'm supposed to return it for the refund. Contacted seller, have heard nothing.

One of the bottles leaked inside/outside of the box, so the the other bottles were covered with the liquid from that soap.  Therefore, I had to wash the soap off of each bottle, which I should not have had to do.  The bottle that leaked was only half full when I received it. Also, as you can see from the picture, the pump on that bottle is broken, which means I will have to take the top off in order to use it, or wait until one of the other ones is empty and then use that top.  I realize this may not be a major issue, however the point is I should have received a full bottle with a pump that actually works, since that is what I paid for! Also the scent is very strong, definitely would not buy again.

Like the headline says, this soap's pretty good, but it's got one major flaw. I'm not sure if it's how the bottle's shaped or something to do with the pump, but once you're nearing the end of the bottle, you're no longer able to get anything out with the pump. To be fair, usually that happens with most things when they're like, nearly empty, but I feel like it happens way too early here, and adding some water doesn't even help much... So yeah, the soap is nice, but the bottle/pump itself has an annoying flaw.

It's way past the return/refund window, so just posting here to caution others - you may want to place these where leaking sticky soap liquid won't cause much damage. I ordered these months ago, and today when I went to reach for the last bottle, I realized that it's been sitting there leaking very slowly all this time (80% content gone). It must have been a very small crack, as the package showed no visible damage upon arrival.

While the product is a good one, the packaging left a lot to be desired! I ordered this for my elderly mom. When she received them, some of the bottles had leaked. One was only about 1/2 full, as the rest had leaked out...all over the other bottles & box! My mom has a hard time standing for long & it was difficult for her to stand & rinse/wipe off the bottles. On top of that, she had a really difficult time opening the bottles & needed a friend to help her. I ordered this to make my mom's life easier, NOT more difficult! Amends should be made...

Ahh I feel so dumb cuz I usually look at reviews before a purchase, but I was just excited about the availability, price and the scent sounded like it would smell decently. Sadly, I was wrong. The smell was super strong. At first, it was not bad, but it wouldn't go away. I was eating a delicious dinner (tacos) and when I would take a bite, I can just smell a grandma's perfume. love grandma's, but come on. It was just overwhelming. I just can't use it anymore. I'm glad I didn't pay very much.

The scent is my favorite for hand soap. The price is a great value also. One tip would be not to push all the way down when dispensing for a simple hand wash, helps save soap and stretch your money even further. I find a full pump is far too much soap for my needs.

I love the scent of this hand soap.  It doesn't dry out my hands even with frequent hand washing during COVID.  My only complaint is the shape of the bottle.  There is always soap left at the bottom and you can't use the pump to get it out.  Seems life a waste.  Otherwise, I love this product.

I really love the quality and foam of this soap. It's around a dollar per bottle, I am very happy with the price as Amazon is not price gauging unlike others. I love Amazon for that. My only problem was half bottles were leaky, dint loose much liquid soap tho. Happy with the soap, wish they dint came leaky and I dint had to order again also clean the bottles.

The soap is really nice, and smells great.  The only problem I had was that one of the bottles had leaked resulting in a mess when I opened the package.  It had lost approximately half of its contents.  The value of this bottle was less than a dollar, so I didn't bother to return or ask for a refund.  I still recommend this product, but I'm not sure I will order it for delivery again.

This is great for an everyday brand like Softsoap. I was looking for a rose-scented soap and this came up. While it sadly doesn’t smell like rose, the scent is nevertheless lovely. It’s more of a musky, powdery, soft scent. I’ll definitely reorder while I stay on the lookout for a rose scented hand soap.
They arrived damaged and spilled all over the place . Not impressed with the scent.

I bought 12 bottles... I was kind of disappointed when they arrived because they smell so horrible. I even had multiple coworkers agree that the smell was horrible. I put 4 bottles in the bathrooms at work and gave the other 8 away. The scent is soooooo strong. My coworkers described it as a strong floral scent and an old lady scent. Do yourself a favor and smell this in person before buying.
These are definitely not aloe soap. I have several from before and none of these new ones smell like the ones I actually have from the store with aloe.

Still hard to find Softsoap in the stores and practically impossible to find the nice big refill bottles, unless you go to Brand-X, which sometimes really doesn't work.  Anyway, this is real stuff and at the time that I bought it, a good price --about a buck a bottle.  The prices on these Softsoap packages seems to fluctuate wildly from week to week at Amazon, so look at a lot of alternatives before making your purchase.

This stuff is horrible! It has an overwhelmingly strong, fake-floral scent that could be used for chemical warfare. I used it only once and had to air out the house afterwards. I couldn't get the smell off my hands even after multiple scrubbings and a shower. The pack of 6 wasn't much of a deal after all. I sent all of it to work with my husband - he works with guys, and I figured they would use anything - but I got a text from him later, saying, "Can I throw the whole box in the dumpster?"  It wasn't even worth the effort to return it. (We didn't want to put the mail carriers at risk, although we do feel a little guilty about the sanitation workers.) Seriously, Amazon, you should consider taking this product off your list.

It has been near impossible to find soft soap at our stores since the advent of Covid 19. It was so nice to be able to order them on Amazon. We just moved into a new home and I needed a soft soap at all the bathroom sinks. I usually try to color coordinate the soap color with the decor of each bathroom, but white works beautifully with any color. We like soft soap and it leaves our hands feeling clean and soft, not dry.

I don't believe that these are the same ingredients as the original. See for yourself. My hands have NEVER been chapped and prickly after any soap I've ever used. Never knew what that felt like until using this. I couldn't even rub my eye without scratching my face because of how bad my hands had been. As soon as I stopped using this soap they were back to normal. Not moisturizong at all and hardly made any suds.

Purchase May 2020. I feel like the softsoap I got was the the old forgotten all the way in the back of the warehouse. Was able to place an order by some miracle. Don’t get me wrong I’m glad I was able to get some soap during this pandemic but was expecting better quality. Color of the bottles are a little off, not as clear as a BRAND new bottle of soft soap. Smell was ok but a bottle or so would smell a little funkier than the last.
Arrived Broken with soap spilled everywhere!

I’ve been using Milk and Golden Honey for years but this recent batch has different scent and is not as rich and creamy as before. It smells nothing like the original delicious smell that lingers. This one is muted chemical smell and seems watered down. Did the change the formula and ruin a good thing? Or did I receive a bad batch?
not sure what was wrong with this soap. My hands were so dry after using it they cracked.
This is the best item ever I’ve been using this for years definitely would recommend every anyone to use it great snow moisturizing and all the above!
Normally use unscented everything EXCEPT for Soft Soap's Milk and Honey.  Hard to find now with COVID 19 and way too expensive!

Great deal so far!! Nothing was leaking or broken upon delivery. I haven't been through all of them yet, but all of the pumps have worked so far! I like the mild scent and gentleness of the soap. I guess I would say it's moisturizing, but I'm a guy so I don't know how much of an authority I am on that. I have 3 bathrooms, plus a kitchen sink to stock so this was perfect! I'll definitely purchase this again!!
Very nice, exactly what you're buying. It has a really nice not too strong scent that lingers on your hand. I bought this so I could stock up, and I will definitely buy again.

Best hand wash! Highly recommend. I’ve been ordering these for a while now and I won’t order anything different. Perfect To keep on hand for every bathroom in the house, even the kitchen. Lasts a long time and smells great, not too overpowering. Couldn’t be more pleased! Thanks for the recommendation from my blogger friends!!! This is where have of my Amazon purchased come from.
We recently discovered this scent, and I was very happy to find this 6-pack for a great price.  Very happy with purchase!

That's exactly what I need. Hand sanitizer. Because I like the smell. But it really mimics what I think of as a fresh, crisp, clean aroma. It's so light and pleasant, so I was happy to find it on Amazon. The main reasonable price.
Smells really nice very light scent

Great value during this pandemic. I have to constantly wash my hands because of my suppressed immune system. Its the same as sold in stores but much cheaper for those of us with an autoimmune disease.
Almost a whole bottle had emptied out and got on everything else in the shipping box. The other 5 were fine; I just had a hard time getting the soap off everything.

This soap has a very nice scent, and not too strong either. I've never bought "moisturizing" soap before, but it really seems to work in that regard. The tiny price for a 6-pack makes this an amazing value, and it's nice that all my sinks have matching soap now, and each with a spare!
I order these through subscribe and save. I’ve ordered twice before with no problem. With my last shipment, NONE of the caps were screwed on properly. I lost 2 1/2 bottles, and the box was a mess.

In this day and age, handwashing is the single most important task to ensure reducing the risk of infections.  This soap has a light, fresh scent (I easily get migraines from strong scents).  Buying in bulk (6 bottles) allows to have one at every sink in the house and have some in reserves.  Plus, it's a great deal for the price. Quality product.
do not like the smell, too heavy
I thought I was getting a great deal when I 1st snatched this up,lol. But these are .98 cents at every Walmart. So, really no great buy,lol. Still love the product though!

Moisturizes. I even use in the morning when I wake up to wash my face. I trust this brand more than the grocery store generic brands by a longshot. The pack of 5 went fast just because I'm an artist and I'm constantly washing paint off my hands. This soap smells delicious and cleans well.

I love the Milk and Golden Honey fragrance of this soap it’s very subtle and soothing. Softsoap provides amazing lather and the value for the money makes it an easy choice. Don’t bother with the knock-off brands as they leave a soapy residue and aren’t as moisturizing. Would definitely recommend.
One of the soaps leaked in the box so I received 1/2 of the amount. The soaps were packaged as is - with no cover (usually arrive in individual bags)
I love this hand soap, BUT, why in the age of Covid, is AMAZON tripling the price from $5.99/6 bottles to over $17.00, and up to $21-22.00 for the same product/quantity?????

I am a rose obsessed person, and believe me, this smells NOTHING like roses. I’m not even sure it smells like a floral blend at all. Don’t buy this for the scent! Works fine otherwise—like all Softsoap basic soaps.

First time buying soap. It was on sale. About $1 each.  It's a thicker and creamer soap.  Gives a nice lather with water.  The scent is nice and not too overpowering.  It provides some moisture.  I wash my hands a lot.  They don't feel dry.  I would buy again.  Recommended

I waited for this product for more than a month. When I received it, two bottles leaked some amount of hand soap in the packaging already. But I was happy with the previous purchase, so I think the inconvenience happened due to the pandemic.
All Soft Soap products are good. Although this one says the scent is milk and honey, I smell coconut. Not an offensive smell by any means but a little too strong.

It's SUCH a shame that you change this fragrance!  As long as I can remember my grandmother has used this soap.  It still brings me back every time I smell it....until now!  Now that you changed the scent, it no longer brings back happy memories.  Now, it smells like an unpleasant musty dish soap!  This is really so sad, I don't know why you would change a scent you've had for so long! PLEASE change it back! This really is such a pity.

this package came on time and as expected thanks to the driver, thank you. it helps get rid of gems especially if you watch the normal amount of time which is about 30 secs. needed during this time and im glad i purchased this and will be purchasing more soon.

I ordered Dial sanitizing hand soap for health concerns but I found it too dry for winter and the smell was unpleasant. Therefore, I decided to order this Softsoap moisturizing hand soap. It has nice honey and milk scent, and it doesn’t leave your hands super dry after washing. But of course I’m not sure how good it is to combat virus and bacteria during covid times.

I wrongly assumed that aloe fresh scent would be something neutral.  After all, aloe has no scent.  It has a strong perfume smell and I hate it.  I can’t remember the last time I used liquid soap and hated the smell.
Very strong scent - maybe some like it but it was too perfuming for me.  And my hands really dried out with it.

SoftSoap does it again with a slam-dunk right onto your bathroom sink!! You think you have the pleasure to feel, no! The pleasure will put the feel, to you! You'll never look back once you go Soft! Each press of that exquisite pump blissfully fulfills ones' desire to obtain that silky, smooth, creamy sensation all over your hands, whilist only seconds away from genuine moisture getting jettisoned into your skin! Never before would one think that dryness and hardness is only a thing of the past!
The pumps did not work on any bottle received.  Tried everything nothing worked.

I brought whole pack, then I finished about 4 bottles, the scent is perfect I love it . But when it still have half bottle I  press it won’t come out or I have keep press many many time to let the liquid come out in every bottles .it is so disappointed
Great hand soap in every way. Too bad the designers  can't figure a way to get to the bottom 3/8" of soap in  the bottom of the bottle by making the tube longer.  What's the deal there?

Nice soft smooth soap for hand washing. Your not using someone else’s dirty soap. And it is cleansing and feels like your hands are softer when finished. With all this alcohol you need some loving hands! This pack is a great price and saves shopping again soon.

It’s soap! Did what I brought it to do. The only thing I didn’t like what the after washing smell. Very weird smell. Not overpowering or gross smelling just off. Packing it was shipped in was great. No broken bottles. My 3 star was due to the scent.
One of my favorite products. The smell is really great and I don’t love the smell of roses in general. Hard to get in stores.

What I like is to be able to have a bottle of  this by every sink in the house. Much better than a bar witch is sticky and melts down. Also this soap is the scent I can use as I'm allergic to most scents and this has just the right one. "Fresh Breeze" I like this way of easy to get soap when needed.

Great value brand & scent.. all of the above but I seemed to have dry hands afterwards, at least they're clean & bacteria free. Using lotion for the time being, could just be winter as it is the time of the year. Still happy with the purchase was convienant.

Soft soap is my favorite bath wash and hand wash soap. This is no exception. I love the sea breeze fragrance on this one - smells like shampoos and perfumes that have that clean, ocean breeze smell. The soap is as moisturizing as typical of their products. Works for me.
The soap is fine but the company packaged it poorly so one was half empty and soap was all over my hallway that had leaked through the box. I wasted my money.

Only got 5 total because one of them was open upon arrival. It was delivered in a box inside a box, so the first box didn't show any signs of problems. It was only when I opened it I saw that one of the 6 bottles of soap had been opened. Very disappointed and I will not purchase again.
Scary that our of the blue this order was placed and charged to my credit card on file.  As a result I have had to remove my credit card on file and cancel my credit card.

The soap is fine and smells and feels good. However I am taking away a star because the  labels on every bottle is wrinkled and poorly glued on, so it looks a bit weird. I don't mind too much but this design flaw kind of irks me. Otherwise, it is great.
I had to toss them all.  I couldn't stand the strong smell

I bought the 6 pack because of the great price. Normally at the stores they are $1.99 a bottle ! SInce Covid it has been difficult to purchase the gallon refills of any brand of soap. SoftSoap is a good brand and I have purchased it often. I use one in the kitchen and one in the bathroom. Highly Recommend.

I like this soap and have a subscription.  We have received this (more than once) with one (or more) bottles with the lid not screwed on completely and the soap is leaking.  I'm not sure if that should be in the review or not.  But the soap itself is nice.

I have been using softsoap for many years and been loyal to them eversince. The scent our mild and not overpowering. I love that it moisturizes too and slippery enough to make sure you wash your hands longer. I just feel that buying in small quantities doesnt reduce our plastic use thus just giving 4 stars.

This product is AMAZING! I love the strong, clean scent and how it lingers after you wash your hands. I found this in a 6 pack and it was a great deal on amazon, about a dollar per bottle. My only regret is that I wish I ordered more at that price. This was my first time using this fragrance of soap and I fell in love with after using it the first time. I just don't understand how anyone could complain about this soap. It smells heavenly and it did not dry out my hands. I strongly recommend.

My favorite softsoap! Love the smell and how it doesn’t dry out my hands after using it. However the Amazon shipment came with 2 bottles busted and leaking soap all over the rest of the stuff in the box and then on my porch. Real nightmare to deal with, but Amazon immediately sent another 6pack expedited with no issues. Would 100% order this separate from the rest of your stuff.

I wish the soap was even gentler and more moisturizing, but as it is it s ok for use twice daily. If you have sensitive skin you should not , AVOID WATER AND ALL SOAPS!!! use an unscented moisturizing hand sanitizer (alcohol based) instead. TLDR; Will dry out skin if used too much, use moisturizing hand sanitizer instead.

I haven't bought Softsoap for a long time.  I have always bought dial soap, but due to the current conditions with high demand and low supply I was willing to give this soap a chance.  Its a great soap and leaves hands clean and smooth.  Very pleased and will consider buying this in the future when it is available.

My girlfriend wanted this and now she has them in every bathroom. She said her hands feel so soft every time she washes her hands with this soap and it makes the bathroom smell good. I would say overall great product and great price.
Love the smell. However, it does not suds much. Don't feel clean after use. Disappointed

They kept reducing size/weight & increasing price too frequently over the years, but I'm willing to pay premium for this product in the ALOE variety. Very nice scent/feel. Sometimes not included on store shelves (since RiteAid here closed). Buy It!

Leaves your hands feeling soft and clean, but when you pump out the soap and move your hands away from the pump it tends to leave a soap trail that gets all over the place. If you keep it close to the edge of the sink it's not an issue, but if it's on the counter or use it over the sink and then to go put it back it can be a problem.
When my package arrived 3 out of the 6 bottles  came with broken pump dispensers and there was soap all over the inside of the bag...total mess
Very unhappy with purchase ; every  pump was defective! Couldn't use any  of them! Now I see  why the price was so low !!

My girlfriend wanted these and she’s obsessed with the fresh scent. She said her hands feel super soft every time she washes her hands with this soap because it has aloe in it. I would say overall great product and great price.

I do love the smell of this soap.  I have a reoccurring subscription and it has come (more than once) with one (or more) of the bottles caps not tight and leaking in the packaging. I'm not sure who's at fault for that.  So I still give it 5 stars.

I'm thrilled that Amazon has been competing with Wal-Mart's prices on a few of these kinds of basics--saves me a trip! This is always a good choice for our powder room and my kids' bathrooms. Nice scent and moisturizing.

The soap is great—if you can get it out of the bottle!  The pump feature only worked on one of the 6 bottles, the rest of them seem to be jammed shut and impossible to dispense!  I finally pried one open with pliers but it doesn’t dispense very well.  Won’t be buying any more.
If you are looking to wash your hands, this is hand soap! Pumps are included! If you hate variety, they're all the same! If you hate going to the store, this is the product and quantity for you!

I scored a great price and coupon combination that made these WAY cheaper than in the store. In the times of Covid-19, my family is washing their hands more than ever ... I'm sure we'll use all these soaps quickly!
Product is spilt all over

This soap is amazing. My girlfriend wanted these and now she’s obsessed with their scent. She said her hands feel soft every time she washes her hands with this soap. I would say overall great product and great price.
Based on the ingredients I assumed this would be very lightly scented. It had a much heavier scent than anticipated. That is what happens when I assume... The quality of the soap was nice, though.

I really like the container and pump. It distributes just the right amount of soap and is not at all hard to unlock and get working. This particular scent is very clean and neutral. There is no globbing on the tip from drying out soap as there just isn't any soap remaining on the pump tip after dispensing. Really nice.

I got these liquid soaps for my guest bathroom. I have been using this brand for a while and its been doing a decent job. Got a very good discount so it was a great buy. This will last me at least 4 month.

Smooth, comfortable on skin and leaves hands feeling clean. The only annoying thing about the soap is (I can't believe I'm going to write this) the plastic straw on the inside isn't long enough to reach the bottom of the container so you aren't able to pump the soap up as the bottle is getting empty. Not a big deal at all though.

These are great! I originally bought these for my kids to take for school since it was on their school supply list but ended up using one cause we ran out of soap before I could make it to the store. Leaves your hands feeling clean, soft, and smelling great!
It felt and smelled nice but I felt like it was drying my hands.  Had to use lotion after each hand washing or my skin would crack and be painful.

This soap works great, simple and to the purpose.we purchased this product before the trend of Covid19 handwashing became a thing on the 🌎 earth. This soap never makes our skin  feel dried out, and for a liquid it has a good amount of suds. We usually order this pack because the price is reasonable and it lasts a while for us.

I really like this soap in a moisturizing sense. But can we talk about the product that's left at the bottom!!? This absolutely irks me!! I hate having to remove the top to be able to get the last bit of soap. The most annoying part!! they should really change that!
I bought this to try it out. I prefer Dial Antibacterial, as this is my top choice, but this is the next best choice when Dial is sold out or currently unavailable.

This is a good hand soap. It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry like other brands and the consistency is also quite thick (I sometimes like to dilute my hand soap to make them last longer, so this is definitely a plus for me). The only thing is that the scent is not as honey sweet as I hoped it would be. But overall a great product at a great price!
Smells really strong!!! I noticed every time I washed my hands the smell actually irritated my throat. My husband deluded it with soft soap but the smell was still too strong!

I bought these thinking they would be anti bacterial due to the pictures shown- and they are not. I’ve read reviews on it being a knock-off and am going to test the product for myself, hopefully my hands don’t dry out from it also! The seller should include a more accurate description/pictures since it differs from the soap I received.

Love this soap! It’s the Best! It’s moisturizing and has a very mild, pleasant smell (I don’t like perfumed soaps and this hardly has any fragrance). I wish it was easier to find the refills during the coronavirus, but so glad to find these individual dispensers!

Anteriormente habia comprado este producto y fue una buena experiencia. Buen empaque y buena calidad. Pero este ultimo pedido, no fue lo que esperaba. La caja llego rota y chorreando jabon. Ninguna de las tapas de los embases estaba bien apretada. Una de ellas llego casi suelta. El producto se desparramo en la caja. Tampoco el aroma del producto olia igual al de la compra que yo habia hecho anteriormente. No tienen los mismos ingredientes.
I really like the lotion-like feel of this, and it has a nice subdued scent.  This was a great value!

Be aware that this is NOT the same as what you’ve purchased before. The list of ingredients on this page are WRONG. The manufacturer has changed the formula and added chemicals that aren’t listed. If you have sensitive skin like I do, this new soap may cause problems. I’ve used it for years and was so excited to finally find some. My hands broke out after only part of a day of using it, so I checked the ingredients. Shame on the manufacturer for not at least putting a “new” somewhere on the label.

This is a great product we’ve used over the years and I was thrilled to find this set at such a reasonable price. This is excellent soap for sensitive skin, with a very light, almost nonexistent scent, which is great for allergy sensitive groups.
An absolute waste of money.  This is not the product they advertise.  It is a fake.  The substance is totally different from the real one.  Do not buy.
I bought a lot of these at the beginning of the pandemic when Kroger/Fred Meyer couldn't supply any soap.  I am just now getting to the end of my stash.  A life saver.  I will buy more.
Genuine, same as you get at the store. It's super soft and much cheaper than the store. The quality is the same. It really helps with dry hands and irritated hands from hand sanitizer.

This is a lotion-like hand sanitizer. Its foam is not very rich and it is  not moisturizing enough, but I like its smell.  Its outer packaging was a bit damaged when it was sent, but the overall value is quite cost-effective.
Not sure if this soap kills enough germs?? The dispenser could be better because when you pull your hand away the soap leaves a thin trail of slimy soap on the countertop.

Awesome!!! After digging in the garbage for my wifes ring,,my hands were black with filth and smelled horrible!!! Just a small squirt of this beautiful White liquid soap,left my hands clean and smelling good!!!! Found my wifes ring too!!!
I’m so glad to get this easy-on-the-skin liquid soap in the pump dispenser again.  They have been missing from store shelves for a while. The multipack gives me one for every sink in the house.
Such a great deal! Lots of value for the money. Smells great too. I keep it in all the bathrooms and the kitchen. This is a better price than Walmart. I’ll definitely buy this pack again!

Does just what it’s meant to! In a time where I’m washing my hands a million times a day this soap is moisturizing & does not dry them out as bad as other hand soaps do! It has a nice clean pleasant smell! A little goes a long way & has amazing lather! Highly recommend, a brand you can trust! Remember to WASH YOUR HANDS!!!
I actually thought this was for a single soap dispenser. It comes with multiple. Great value va buying locally at the store. Fast shipping and smells great when using.

Great scent... my favorite so far ...not overpowering, just clean and nice.. Getting six dispensers is very cool too, as these will last longer than a much more expensive soap dispenser that you buy somewhere else.

The picture shows pumps in these bottles but when they arrived there were no pumps so I have to pour them into older bottles to be able to pump instead of picking the whole thing up and pouring into our hands.
I did enjoy this soap.  However, they don't contain much.  It also seems that more is suspended with the air foam dispensers.  I can get more for my money elsewhere.

Smells so good !! Like fresh laundry & im trying to figure out how it smells good on hand soap but it does !! Super cheap but still the same quality as all the other soaps & if you like the smell of fresh linen or clean , this is for you !! Stock up on it because you can’t find $1 per bottle of soap anywhere else. I love this & I hope you do too ! Will keep buying more.

THE ORDER CAME IN LEAKING. THE CARRIER KINDLY PUT IT IN A PLASTIC BAG IN ORDER TO KEEP IT FROM GETTING ON THE OTHER PACKAGES. WHEN I OPENED THE PACKAGE, I SAW THAT A COUPLE OF THE TOPS ON THE BOTTLES HAD COME OFF. ONE BOTTLE HAD LEAKED OUT COMPLETELY AND ANOTHER BOTTLE ONLY HAD ABOUT 1/2 OF THE PRODUCT IN IT.  IF I PAY FOR 12, I WANT 12, NOT 10 AND A HALF. THAT IS THE ONLY COMPLAINT I HAD ABOUT THIS PRODUCT.  - IT SMELLS AMAZING AND YOU CAN TELL THAT IT IS MOISTURIZING.

Soft soap is the only brand that we trust and use daily for the pass 20 years.  Love that it doesn’t have very strong fragrance smells.  It’s great for my kids especially when they need to wash hands before putting contact lenses on their eyes.

The sent is nice, unfortunately when the soap arrived there was one with a cracked pump top.  I have attached photos.  This easily could have been avoided had there been more packing material in the box.

Do you likeoverpowering scents? Do you like your hands to smell like perfumed soap for hours on end? Then this is the soap for you. If not, stay away from this. I personally don't like the scent. I will not purchase again.
Excellent deal! Love this soap. Very smooth on hand and leaves a gentle touch. No stinging with cracked hands. Scent is Pleasent and not strong. Came in nicely packaged with no damage.
Moisturizes better than most other liquid hand soaps. Thick and rich, nice light scent; not overwhelming honey or milk scent but a good combination. Good value. Would buy again.
bought this after i ran out of my supply of B&BW hand soaps. The fragrance for this soap is so strong it is nauseating.

I Iove soft soap products. There is no scent, but the moisturizing effect is wonderful for your hands. No dryness and for the value of the money it is well worth every penny spent. This is my second time ordering this item.
I have opened 2 so far and both are leaking from the pump.
Although I received 6 bottles of this not one of them had a pump that worked. There was no spring in the mechanism and I couldn’t get the soap out of the bottle

I was using a natural soap and got this because it was available during the pandemic.  Oh my gosh....the scent is amazing! I forgot how rich and sudsy this soap was.  I'm switching back permanently now.
Much better than washing hands with dishsoap!I decided to give this soap a try and it is very moisturizing and smells clean.I also like the quantity offered in this deal.
Nice scent, and a great price. Less than $1 each including delivery can't be beat!
I love the scent its absolutely wonderful but it does not really moisturize....i wash my hands ALOT and it dries out my hands as opposed to moisturizing!
This was a great buy.  6 bottles for just over 6 bucks. The soap is moisturizing and lathers well. I think we all need to have an extra supply of hand soap during these times.

What I like that got this on Prime Day and got them at a very affordable price for 6. Was like buying 5 and getting one free. So happy with how well it was packaged and arrived at a decent time manner. Thank you.

Love the soap and the scent. Great price and I didn't have to hunt for them at the local stores and was able to buy as many as I wanted instead of just 2 due to local restrictions. I will be buying this again for sure!!!
Was a great deal, definitely it worths the money! My family and I have always used this soap and we love it. And with this deal we save some money!

I like the way it feels on my hands, especially now that we need to wash our hands more often now than before.  I've bought this several times and have sent them to family and friends as gifts. Very practical and inexpensive.
smell good make my hand soft and for now everyone need this，hope everybody safe
This soap smells fantastic. It is very good at moisturizing. It is noticeably superior than other soaps
I love this hand soap.  It smells great and doesn't irritate my skin.  I do think it's too thick and I always add water to it.  That way it's not too hard to rinse off and it lasts longer.

Running low on hand soap? This is great. We stocked up our bathrooms and kitchens with this and still even had some leftover afterward. This smells great and works well. There is a nice consistency for you to get a good lather.
Came fast but a bottle spilled and left two with soap all over them and made for a pretty messy package. I was able to salvage them, so it was okay.
Purchased some time ago but with the Coronavirus it is the "go to" hand soap to use between hand sanitizers and other harsher hand soaps for moisturizing.
They are good quality, valuable. Keep skin is clean and moisturizering. Love them. Not strong smell.
Great for my son who has ocd and washes his hands alot. Keeps them from getting to raw

i got this deal from amazon and i was looking to change my hand soap for long time. i received it about two weeks ago and i love it. it has nice cent and moisturizing. plus value is nice for money spent.
I am a teacher and constantly washing me hands, due to covid19 recommendations. This soap does not dry out my hands. It smells amazing.
It’s soap! Did what I brought it to do. This scent is way better than the other one. Packaging it was shipped in was great. No broken bottles.

I've used this kind before and was glad when it came up with such a great deal on them.  I'm sure I won't be disappointed with them. Haven't had to use them yet.  Wanted to use up what I was already using first.
It's soap for crying out loud.  Can't get too excited about it.  I dispenses easily, foams up, removes dirt and grime.  Good price.

I really love the scent of this hand soap, it has a clean refreshing smell.  Didn't notice it being very moisturizing but not using soap for that purpose so I really like this one and will continue to buy as long as they make it.

It's soap. It cleans. Drying, but that could be because we are washing our hands like lunatics these days. The packaging is great. This is the first soap I've gotten online that hasn't either leaked or broken in transit
Great deal and love the way it makes my skin feel. You can feel the moisturizing properties. Not to heavy on scent, very light and delicate.
Has a clean and light scent that stays on your hands after washing which I like.
